As the last few notes rang out, a slot in the door opened, revealing a leering set of eyes.

"State your business!"

"Hi! I'm Pinkie Pie! I'm here for the tour? It said so on my Ticket, see?" Pinkie wriggled from her friend's grasp to show off her glittering slip. The eyes flitted through the words before speaking again.

"I see. Just a moment..." The sounds of locks and gears whirring echoed from inside before the door slowly creaked open, a purple-gloved hand waving the girls inside.
152322.title: Stripping for the Planks

choices: A panel opens under Pinkie
The walls fall around them to reveal a more promising sight
1523221.content:
Pinkie turned to her friends, her mile-wide smirk saying all she wanted to say. "Pinkie..." Applejack said as she rolled her eyes, "...this situation still got more holes than a termite-infested cider barrel." Pinkie said nothing and instead folded her arms with an eyebrow cocked. "Well this barrel is letting me in the door, so ya better come in if you wanna get in!" Without another word, Pinkie's body turned around and rushed into the door as her head kept glancing to the girls. "Pinkie! Wait!" Rainbow yelled as she rushed after the pink girl, with everyone else following in short succession.

With a swirl of her head, Pinkie looked about the immediate surroundings. Dust and rusted walls, such a clever ruse to ward off those less determined to the prize. Hearing the donor's refusal to be shut, Pinkie turned back to see her friends following her in. "See? You girls putting on such a panic yet here you girls are for me." "This is for for your safety more than anything else." Fluttershy gulped as she hid behind Sunset, who was looking over exactly what had given them entrance. The what being said because instead of a person, the girls were looking at a bizarre load of gears, pulleys and rusted dust with fake eyes and hands connected to the doors. "How reassuring..." Rarity mumbled yet not focussing the enthusiasm of Pinkie, who ran to the desk in front of them and waved her shining ticket about in the air as moths swirled around it. "Alrighty! Any moment now! Where is that tour?" The girls all stayed silent, watched as Pinkie's bouncing perpetually slowed as she leaned into the cobweb coated desk. Finally, Pinkie looked to the desk and slammed her hand on a rather shiny bell.
1523221.title: Pinkie and the rest venture inside

choices: Pinkie's clapping is joined by another
Pinkie leads the girls down a marked hallway, adventure awaits
The trick is a mere distraction from the real trap
15232212.content:
"Huh...where's the bellboy?" Pinkie asked, eagerly looking about with a manic sense of glee.

"There is no bellhop Pinkie, 'cause this here factory is abandoned. We oughta go be'fer somethin' bad happens to us," AJ sighed, growing frazzled from Pinkie's stubborn persistence.

"And besides, a bellhop is for hotels, not factories. You'd be looking for a secretary," Twilight noted, pushing her dark glasses up back closer to the back of her nose.

"It doesn't really matter who comes, so long as we can get my super-dy duper tour started! There's gonna be tons of fun and free sweets~ And even a special surprise at the end!" Pinkie beamed, face consumed with a splitting grin far too wide for normal individuals. "And that means we need someone now please!" she crooned, ringing the bell again. Silence befell the creaky factory interior.

"Ya see, I told y'all that-" with AJ cut short, the girls watched as the walls began to quake, rumbling and shaking every which a-way. "Land's sake! An earthquake! Get down everyone!"All but Pinkie ducked down, awaiting a terrible tremor to shake them about. In its place was the sliding and falling back of the walls, revealing a polished, posh interior hallway in place of the once drab emptiness minutes before.

"Wowy zowy! It's even cooler than before!" Pinkie squealed with delight, clapping her hands at the show of force.
15232212.title: Toppling the Old with the New

choices: A recorded intercom begins as the girls reach their first stop.
Each of the girls get a distressing chill down thier spine...
152322122.content:
Pinkie's friends all looked to one another, various faces of worry and confusion adorning them. The clean and shining metal walls already created a atmosphere far different than what they had walked into. But it did not dissuade from the strange circumstances about this. But they had little time to discuss amongst themselves as Pinkie's squealing had reached a new height as she pointed to a new hallway with a flashing arrow pointing towards it. "Look girls! That's got be where the tour starts! Free candy and sweets, here we come!" "Pinkie, please listen to reason..." Rarity started, only for Pinkie to pull off a tuft of hair and fashion a lasso. "Come on little doggies, I am not gonna let my bestest friends miss out on the opportunity of a lifetime!" By this time, the girls realized that Pinkie was not going to be dissuaded from her path. Allowing the pink lasso to ensure them, the girls all collectively sighed as Pinkie led them into the hallway. As the last foot stepped beyond the entrance to the hallway, a heavy metal door silently slid behind them and locked them on thier path.

"Candy, candy, candy..." Pinkie hummed as she continued along the glowing hallway, "...such glorious candy!"
152322122.title: Pinkie leads the girls down a marked hallway, a...

choices: The Chocolate Room
The Growing Fields
The Flavoring Room
1523221221.content:
As the mostly trepidatious group followed behind their manic pink leader, a soft chime cued, alerting the girls to a sound system built into the walls of the building.

"Hello and Welcome Golden Guests to the Wonderful World of Ms. Willow Wonka's Fabulous Factory! Inside, you'll be escorted along our automated touring system with free samples scattered about while you learn the ins and outs of how our company produces and distributes our world famous candy and other tasty treats! Please, follow the arrows to your first station along the wondrous journey ahead of you~"

"Oh boy! A whole tour with nothing but us and super yummy treats! Come on, we've just got to see what the first station is!" Pinkie practically screamed in utter delight, bolting and bouncing along the hall with derelict speed.

"Pinkie wait! G-get back here!" Rainbow shouted, sprinting behind her friend as the rest jaunted behind, forming a slow trail until they all met before a small wooden door, many winded from their unexpected jog.

"Heavens Pinkie...warn us before...running off...like that...!" Rarity huffed between ragged breaths.

"Sooooory Rarity, but I just can't contain myself! This is so exciting, I could just pop like an overblown balloon!" she giggled. The voice chimed over once more.

"Welcome to Station One on your whirlwind tour:"
1523221221.title: Auto-Tour (Patent-Pending)

choices: One of the girls find the 'experimental' plants
AJ and Pinkie both discover more of the 'gardening' system
15232212212.content:
The door flung open, bright sunlight shining through the open door as if heaven itself was beyond. (The way Pinke was jumping, it might as well have been.) The girl followed along into a room at least twice as big as the lunchroom in school and had twice as many windows. Within various rows of dirt and barriers, plants of all shapes and sizes grew ranging from small bushes to palm trees.
"As not many are aware of, chocolate does not simply appear whenever one wishes. It and many other ingrediants that go into our delicous candies have to be grown and prepared in order to have the perfection my company has been known for. Looking to both your left and right, you can see the fantastic gardens that are used to harvest various fruits, nuts and spices. It took more than nine months to plan out this sort of arrangement and even longer to figure out how so many different varieties of plants can grow together while still meeting thier varied level of nutrients. Please feel free to explore and relax, just be careful not to get too close or excessively touch the plants as a few are rather experimental." Each of the girls took a moment to marvel at the large spread before them, Applejack especially finding interest in this marvel of gardening. "Ah'll be darned...all these trees and plants...and they all look so healthy..." Pinkie couldn't hear her farm girl friend as she was busy rushing about the rows of strawberry bushes and banana trees. So instead, AN decided to do some exploring of her own while everyone else stayed reluctant and together.
15232212212.title: The Growing Fields

choices: AJ and Pinkie meddle about with the experimental plants
Pinkie presses a few keys, "planting" a good friend into the garden
AJ sees a chance to become closer with her lifelong fruit
152322122122.content:
Still strolling about, AJ and Pinkie soon wandered their way towards the back edges of the gardens, a few blank spaces of wall present against what should have been more cases and linings for plants.

"Huh? Woulda figured they'dve put somethin' more round the back end of it all," AJ remakred, placing her hands against the walls.

"Hmm...I betcha there's a secret switch or something right around..." Pinkie fiddled her hand about a bearby display, fishing the wall until her hand pressed against an indented panel. "Here! Oooh boy! Please be a secret chest full of gummy fruits~" Before AJ's eyes, a section of the wall slid back, revealing a small room filled with screens and keyboards.

"Well, Ah'll be! So this is the stuff behind their lil farmin' miracle: cheatin' with computers," the farmer huffed. "Can't say Ah'm terribly surprised, but still..."

"Ooo~ Look at aaaaaallll these buttons! Wonder what this one does?" Pinkie giggled, pressing a few keys. The screens lit up displaying vital statistics and key information. "This isn't candy...booooring!"

"Geez Pinkie, that least we can do is take a lil peek," AJ sighed, plunking herself down at the command chair.
152322122122.title: Master's Controls

choices: Thier efforts bring an odd fruit with one of the girls find
Applejack begins acting...odd
1523221221221.content:
Although Applejack still had every reason in the world to stand against this place, a small part of her couldn't help but follow Pinkie's disappointment in the lack of sweets to eat. She had to admit though, this computing system did have quite a view of the garden and all of it's included machines. On each screen she could see many varieties of plants with tons of information about them on the screens beside them such as harvest rate, amount of water they needed, all the kinds of things that any real farmer should know about their crops without the use of all this technology. As much as Applejack hated to admit it, this command center did have quite a few advantages and she almost felt a sliver of respect for such meticulous research (but she would never admit it to her friends or family by any means.)


Looking back to the view of the gardens, AJ saw her frends seeming to seperate slightly as they made thier own investigations of the garden. Fluttershy seemed to be looking for any animals or insects in the trees with her slightly disappointed face showing her current failure. Twilight and Sunset were discussing amongst themselves by some bushes about the science of it all no doubt. Meanwhile, Rainbow and Raity were on oppisite sides of a watermelon patch. Rainbow was talking over at Rarity who was (huge suprise) checking her makeup. AJ put a hand to her chin, unaware that Pinkie was looking over the vast amount of shiny, jolly, candy-like buttons around the console. Before AJ could know, Pinkie pressed a button with a shower on in, sending sprays of water across the watermelon patch spooking the two girls with Raity going into a frenzy.


"Pinkie...what button was that?" "Oh, it was this set of blue button over here." Pinkie pointed to the set of similarly printed buttons, each with a label above dictating the types of plants they were spraying. It was filled with plants that the farmer could recognize, bu on particular intest was a short section of button put under the labeled X. "What in tarnation is that x doing there?" "Well..." Pinkie had her eyes set back into the screens. "...the tour voice did say that some of these plants were experimental....and those look as experimental as any pie I've made in the last two weeks." Applejack looked to the screen Pinkie was pointing to and had to admit she found some interesting plants. Although one could easily mistake them as ferns at first glance, thier unusual orange speckled look would give the closer examination cause for pause. They stood straight and tall in thier own area of the garden, a ways off from everything else and under a dark purple lamp. "Now what do yah'll suppose those plants are for?" "I don't know Jackie, but these X plants got thier own set of buttons along with the water. Watch!" Pinkie pressed a few buttons on a seperate console and watched as the purple light turned green and thier speckles turned while. "Uhh, Pinks, ah don't know if we should be fiddling with that stuff...." Pinkie glanced to her friend with a smirk as she pulled a lever and two gloves poppede from the console as two metal hands came from the celing above the plants. "You sure you ain't curious AJ? I bet these plants would like to be handled with a 'real farmer's touch?" "But that's a robot with mah hand movements...." Pinkie said nothing as she changed the light to pink and the speckles to blue and slipped her hands into the gloves. AJ shivered as Pinkie fillded with the plant leaves between the robotic finger, such nere uncaring nature......any plant had to be handled with respect.....

"Give me those!" AJ growled as she pulled Pinkie's arms away from the gloves. "Yah'll are using too much pressure! Yah gotta be gentle...like this...." AJ cradled the leaves, amazed that she could somehow feel them through the gloves. She lighty brushed the smooth greenery, feeling the soft areas of the spots almost tickling her. Meanwhile, Pinkie continued to fiddle with the lights, changing colors almost every three seconds.
1523221221221.title: Curiosity Flicked The Fern

choices: Dash doesn't care, it's time to eat!
Back at the control deck, Pinkie and AJ offer a sample
Twilight has already taken a bite...for science of course
15232212212211.content:
The two continued to fiddle about with the computerized system, effectively making the hidden garden a wild strobe light rave. As such, it was quick to attract the attention of the remaining girls, unable to ignore the wild flashes and sounds. Their eyes were first drawn to the multi-colored, flashing blasts of light before noting the ever-changing ferns.

"Huh, guess the computers were as bored as we were," Dash observed, wishing their was some rockin' tunes to jam along with.

"But look at these plants! I've never seen anything quite like them, especially with this kind of photosensitive chromatic altercations," Twilight craned her head, trying to analyze the flora while not interfering with the mechanical prowess of the robotic arms.

"Neither have I, even in Equestria. I wonder what they could be?" Sunset pondered, keeping Twilight within arm's reach. The facility had given all of them the creeps, but Sunset was particularly unsettled with the setting. She couldn;t place her finger exactly why, but the building had a ...sinister vibe to it, as though they were all a part of a greater plot.

"Woah! It's producing fruit~" Twilight pointed to a rapidly developing berry. The group turned their attention to the growing bushel of small, colorful berries swelling around the tips of each fern. The strange thing was, the fruit would change much like the spots, but remain locked in color once the fruit had matured, leaving some berries violet while others were gold or cyan.

Brooooarp

"Mmm~ Glad this place has the sense to grow us some snacks," Dash beamed, leaning in to take a handful for herself. Her hand was quickly batted away by Sunset. "H-hey!"

"Seriously Dash? Eating weird fruit we have no idea if it's safe?" Sunset shook her head. "If this place wanted us to eat anything, something tells me it'd offer it first."
15232212212211.title: Fernish Fruits for Friends

choices: The girls come just in time to see Rainbow transform
Rainbow has vanished and the girls are all freaking out
152322122122111.content:
"It didn't start growing until we came by; I call that offer enough." With that, Rainbow shoved her hand across the plants and pulled out a fistful of the multicolored fruits. The girl could do little to stop her as she shoved the whole bunch into her mouth. Blue and orange juices began to ooze from her mouth as she slowly chewed with a wild look to her eyes. "Oh my god girls! These are amazing!" "Rainbow, at least have the sense to not eat with your mouth full." Rarity shuttered as Rainbow took another handful and held it out to the girls. "Come on gal pals." She said as she tossed another into her gob. "These things just keep on growing for us." Rainbow wasn't kidding, it seemed like whenever she had picked off one fruit up to three would take it's place. Nevertheless, the girls kept thier distance. "Well Rainbow..." Fluttershy stammered, "Maybe you could at least...hold off until later." Rainbow didn't seem to listen, continuing to place fruit after fruit into her waiting maw and chewing them as juice kept dribbling from her overfil.

From in thier observatory, AJ and Pinkie had finally realized what was going on. Both of them stared at the screen, though each had differing opinions of what they were viewing. "Figures that darn Rainbow would just take it. That girl needs to learn a little self control ah tell ya what." Applejack turned to Pinkie, only to find the girl had left the station and was rushing back into the garden. A strong howling ringing through the air. SAVE MY SWEETS FOR ME YOU HOG! "Darn it Pinkie...." Applejack muttered as she took off the gloves and rushed after her friend. A few moments after she left, a shadowy figure appeared on the info screen with dark purple words.

SelF COntroL iS A MuSt, WoULDN't yOU say?
152322122122111.title: Dash doesn't care, it's time to eat!

choices: Story 5
Story 6
Secret Option - Shh!
15233.content:
Story 5 - It's Pinkie Pie's birthday! And who doesn't love having a fun themed birthday party with all of your close friends and family? But when does a theme go to far? Perhaps when everyone and everything is turning blue, even you!

Story 6 - Spring has sprung and the Pinkie Cave needs a seasonal cleaning. But what's this funny stuff growing in Pinkie's number of cupboards? And why does it taste just like blueberry pie and ice cream?
15233.title: Even More Options

choices: Story 7
Story 8
Story 9
Back to the Secret Option
152333.content:
Story 7 - Pinkie is ecstatic when school play this year will be adapting one of her favorite manga's. The teen auditions for and lands the part of her favorite character in the magna, a supporting female who inflates into a giant blueberry. However at practice, Pinkie gets into heated disagreement with the play's director Rarity over the latter's disappointingly cheap and pragmatic approach to the former's character transformation. Thus Pinkie is determined to have her inflation be genuine and real, and she sets out to find out any method possible to make herself into a blueberry.

Story 8 - Pinkie learns an indie game company is recruiting volunteers at Canterlot High to beta test their new Science-Fantasy MMORPG Berry-Quest. The game’s premise is the players control adventurous blueberry women battling an evil intergalactic empire under the command of an undead warlock. The teen party girl gets herself and her friends on board quickly but when they spend the weekend playing the game, a freak accident (which Pinkie had unintentionally contributed to the circumstances of) with the game server occurs that causes everyone playing Berry-Quest to become their big, blue, and spherical avatars.

Story 9 - Pinkie is excited when a circus comes to Canterlot. The Fruit Berry Sisters Circus has a special gimmick in that the performers of this all female troupe swell up into large round fruit. Pinkie is certainly is drawn to the fruity spectacle and when the circus announces they're hiring volunteers for the rest of their stay in Canterlot, Pinkie Pie jumps at the chance for her big break at the big top.
152333.title: Wait!

choices: Pinkie's friends suddenly find a game copy in thier hands (thanks to Pinkie)
Pinkie decides to do a short test run of the game.
Pinkie decides to talk to Cobalt Code, can't let character go to waste.
1523332.content:
It was shining, sunny, Thursday afternoon at Canterlot High School, as the students were eager to finish their final class for the day. It was special since the wouldn’t have not Friday off, but Monday off as well. One of those students was of course, Pinkie Pie. Her mind was racing over what to do. Her eyes were darting from the clock to the whiteboard then to her notes to write down (plus a little sketching), and then back to the clock. The only thing that interrupted this habit was the oncoming announcement on the school intercom.

“Good afternoon, students.” Vice Principal Luna announced over the intercom, “I know you are all eager for the long weekend ahead. I would like to report that there is an indie developer, who happens to be a good friend of mine, is looking for volunteers to beta test her new video game. It’s a Virtual Reality Science Fantasy MMORPG called Berry Quest. Cobalt Code has a booth set up by the school entrance for all volunteers, students and/or faculty wanting, to participate in testing. Thank you and have a good weekend.”

“A new video Game!?” Pinkie thought, “Oh I wonder what that could be?”

After the announcement ended, Pinkie tried to quickly glance at out classroom door. Thankfully, her class was rather close to Canterlot High’s entrance, and she could already see a game poster. It was trio of large, round, heroric blueberry-like women. The first one dressed as sorceress dressed in a violet cloak and whose weapon, a golden rod, held by projected hands as were the other two. The second blueberry was a ranger taking aim with a bow taller than her inflated body, and the last one was an armored knight with an oversized sword and shield, battling an army of killer war cyborgs with chainsaws for hands and shoulder mounted missile launchers. One look at that poster had the party girl on board with the VR game immediately. Everything Pinkie imagined she could do for the weekend was now thrown out, and she could already see it what was taking its place: Spending the whole 4-day weekend with her friends on an epic science fantasy virtual adventure. There was only one thing standing in the way, time. Pinkie took another look at the clock again impatiently.

“Come on. Come on. Come on. Why does that final bell always take forever?” Pinkie Pie pleaded.

*RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIINNNNNNNNNGGGGGGGGG!!!!!!*

Pinkie immediately cheered as the class’s final bell rang and instantly got out of her seat, leaving her supplies at her desk, and busted the classroom down with charging shoulder tackle. The pink teen quickly made an immediate beeline towards that game booth so fast it looked a pink dust storm was approaching.

“Hi-is-this-where-I-can-that-great-Berry-Quest-game?” Pinkie said very quickly, catching the woman at the table, the game developer’s founder and namesake, by surprise.

“Uh.. Yes mi…” Cobalt Code answered, before Pinkie interrupted her again.

"PERFECT!" the pink teen quickly grabbed a whole column of game copies and VR equipment needed for her friends. The pink teen was too caught up in the moment to remember if her or her friends’ computers were up to the game’s requirements, but if they weren’t she knew it was nothing a little magic couldn’t fix.
1523332.title: Story 8

choices: A beautiful sapphire castle.
A rural village full of berry women.
A camp set inside a forest of blue trees and bushes.
Actually somewhere else.
15233322.content:
At home, Pinkie had set down one set of the VR Equipment on her bed. The teen decided on a test run of the game and had gotten an instruction booklet out from one of the game copies. The equipment was one Blueberry like helmet and back unit (which according to the manual had the processing equipment and software to allow players to livestream their game, and a pair of blue gloves with a LED crystal-like cluster blueberries on the back of each hand.

“Okie Dokie Lokie, ‘VR Equipment Setup in 3 Easy Steps’: Step 1,” Pinkie read the instructions out loud, “Use the official Berry Quest App on your smartphone to create your player account by entering your username, email, and account password. After that, set the phone camera to yourself. The facial recognition software of our phone app will create your avatar for the game for you. Hey! That’s nifty!”

Pinkie inserted phone into a yo-yo and slung it forward to take a full body selfie. Once the yo-yo reeled back, Pinkie had her free hand remove the phone and finger from the yo-yo and then put said finger on the manual’s next step.

“Step 2, After installing Berry Quest onto an internet connected computer, insert your smartphone into the official Berry Quest Virtual Reality Helmet to allow voice chat. The slot will be located on the inside of the helmet.”

Pinkie tilted her helmet 180 degrees and quickly found the slot, and once she found the slot she quickly inserted her phone into it, hearing a resonating click. Afterwards, she went back to the manual to read the last step.

“Step 3, Connect all 3 of the official Berry Quest equipment to the back unit. Make sure that each piece of equipment has 3 D*teeheehee*-Cell Batteries inserted in each battery compartment.”

Pinkie did one final inspection of her game equipment: the blue helmet held her phone, the gloves felt charged, and she had just plugged each of them into the back unit with the components’ wires having the perfect amount of length to give the pink high schooler plenty of movement but not trip up on them. Pinkie strapped on the back unit onto herself like a backpack, then put on the gloves second. She got her on computer and began running the game.

Berry Quest Login:
Username: PinkPartyGirl
Password: *********

Once the password was entered, Pinkie Pie was officially logged in, and ready to enter the world of Berry Quest. Pinkie slid the blueberry shaped VR helmet on to her head, attaching the helmet strap, and finally turned on the helmet’s power button. The lights of the gloves turn, signaling the equipment was in use. In a blue flash on the helmet's lens, Pinkie had found herself in the game at…
15233322.title: Pinkie decides to do a short test run of the game.

choices: Explore the well
Explore the town
152333222.content: To say that Pinkie was ecstatic at what she was seeing would be an understatement. She seemed to have been placed in a small village, with astectics similar to textbook pictures of rural towns from the medieval age. She seemed to be standing right beside a well glowing a dark blue hue with a small garden in her general vicinity. Taking a few steps forward, Pinkie took in the sights of the village itself. Despite the simplicity of their designs, the houses along the street all had signs or some design feature that helped them stand apart from the others. What really helped catch Pinkie' s eye however were the folks going in and out of said houses. Thier stomachs were far greater than any Pinkie seen in the real world, with skin color ranging from sky blue to dark indigo poking from their dresses. From the facial and bodily features, they all seemed to be women. "Wow!" Pinkie exclaimed as she brought her hands to her face, "That Cobalt must have worked so hard on this..." Although Pinkie was gushing hard, it did not stop her from noticing her game hands were blue as well. Taking a look at her chareter's body, Pinkie found she was a rather quaint shade of cerulean, though not as big in the belly as many of the folks around her. In fact, it seemed she was still using her legs as opposed to all the other berrywomen about her. "Maybe just a leveling thing..." Pinkie thought as she wondered what to do next. This well seemed to be glowing from one reason or another, so that was an option. Then again, there were all these little shops and people to converse with. And there seemed to be a bakery a few houses down anyways.
152333222.title: A rural village full of berry women.

choices: Onward to that well, Pinkie's adventure begins!
Check out that Bakery, and spend the rest of the Berrays on sundries.
Meanwhile with the other "order members" in the real world.
1523332222.content:
Pinkie’s first instinct was to head into town, after all that’s where any good adventure began. Heading out to the square of the village, the first building that caught Pinkie’s eye was a weapons-and-armor shop.

“Would be nice to … hey!” The teen said before felt a pouch on the left of her cerulean belly, she grabbed it and examined it. It was pouch containing 3,000 Berrays, the game’s currency. There was a note attached to it, reading, “Thank you from The Berry Quest Developer for volunteering for Beta Testing our game.”

Pinkie immediately went to the store, where she was greeted by a blueberry woman, whose size would have equated to around what Pinkie guessed to be 3-5 months of playtime.

“Welcome how can I help you?” the shopkeeper asked.

“Hi, I just started on my adventure, and I would like to buy plenty of equipment. A whole lot of equipment since I’m going to have my friends over for a while, and then we’re going to be spending the entire weekend here on an epic blueberry adventure!” Pinkie had answered.

“Why certainly milady, feel free to help yourself.”

The Blue teen had purchased a good number of weapons and armor, ranging from swords and shields, staves and robes, and both leather and metal armors, for herself and her friends with her Berrays, with one set of which she immediately changed into. They were set of furs of what Pinkie guess would be the game’s equivalent of a big cat. For starting weapon, Pinkie had chosen a decently sized Hand Axe, its blade made of iron while the handle was wood with a reddened finish. Holding that much equipment was easy since Pinkie used her belly like a basket. When she was ready to check out, she handed all the armaments on to the table, then got out her pouch of Berrays and emptied it on the table.

"Thank for your patronage Miss…?” The Armorer blueberry woman asked, never getting her recent customer’s name.

Pinkie replied boisterously “Pinkamena Diane Pie of the Order of the Rainboom!”
1523332222.title: Explore the town

choices: Back to Pinkie as her friends appear
Back to Pinkie as her solo adventure continues
15233322223.content: "Okay, ah'll bite, what the hay is all this about?" Applejack glanced at the box, turning it about in her hands." She wasn't the only one in the room looking in awe at the game's contents, at least not symbolically. The rest of the girls (having walked out of school and to their homes at an average pace instead of jumping on the Pink Rocket) had gathered around a chatroom with their laptop cameras to discuss the large boxes that had somehow managed to get carefully stuffed into their backpacks. "Isn't it obvious AJ" Sunset claimed as she opened up the package, "Looks like Pinkie's wants us to try out that game Luna told us about." The girls all nodded in understanding, knowing full well only Pinkie had the skills to put something so large into their backpacks without knowing until the weight became obvious. Rarity and Fluttershy both glanced to one another before the fashionista spoke out. "As much as Pinkie would be understandably excited, I never really was one for games. Especially not such violent seeming ones." "Yeah, that warlock thing from the cutout at school seemed scary." Rainbow and Twilight said nothing as it was painfully obvious that their attention was focused on setting up the device. When Rainbow realized she could weigh in her two cents, she laughed with her usual can-do attitude. "You girls can do what you want, but I've got no practice or homework today and I ain't letting a gift from Pinkie go to waste." "Besides, it would be interesting to see what that Cobalt Code woman has put into such an experience." The enthusiasm of those two seemed to sway over the rest, each putting on the readying the headset and gloves at their own pace.
15233322223.title: Meanwhile with the other "order members"...

choices: Onwards to that well.
Back into town, for quests and supplies.
To elsewhere.
152333222231.content:
Rarity briefly sighed as she reluctantly pressed the helmet’s ON button. After the blue flash, Rarity had found herself in the same garden and thankfully the other girls were there as well. The fashionista’s friends there as well. They had looked at the environment and were in awe at the game’s graphics.

“Wow, these graphics are incredible.” Sunset said.
When the girls looked at themselves, the girls then noticed that they were blue, and their game characters’ midsections have bloated.

“What in tarnation? What happin’ to us?” Applejack asked.

“As if this game’s premise couldn’t go out of its way.” Rarity said, disapproving of the game’s design decisions.

“I-I-It’s just a game Rares.” Rainbow defended, just as surprised about her avatar’s bloated body as her friends, “I’m there is a pretty good lore reason why we’re like this or something.”

Twilight silently inserted an indigo finger into the protruding belly, feeling the juice inside squishing and sloshing.

“So How do we find Pinkie?” Fluttershy asked

Sunset had gotten out some in-game manuals.

“Okay, it says here that we can try to invite her with a ‘Pairing-winkle’.” Sunset said, while Rarity was cringing at the pun, “A few of them came with the kit the beta testers received.”

Sunset had gotten out the Pairing-winkle. It was a clear turquoise crystal shaped like a blueberry.

“Do you know how it work?” Twilight asked

“Uh… we just say the name of who want to invite.”

“So we just say ‘we want to invite Pinkie Pie’?”

The Pairing-Winkle began to glow a blue light then shot itself into the sky, exploding in a burst of cyan light. Pinkie then appeared in blurring streak of blue and magenta, seemingly accepted the invitation.

“Hi girls! You just caught me as I was leaving the armory. I’m so excited you all! I’ve all of this equipment for you.” She yelled excitedly.

Her friends took a good look Pinkie, whose namesake who could now could be applied to her hair. In fact, Pinkie’s belly looked slightly bigger than theirs. Before the girls could say a word, the pink haired warrior was already unloading the equipment she bought onto her friends. Applejack received the metal shield and armor of a paladin. The Armor disappear in a flash of data when it reached AJ’s phthalo hands and then reappeared on the farm teen’s body, the appearance readjusted to fit AJ’s rustic look, even her hat looked like a cross between her Stetson and a knight’s helmet. Sunset found herself in the robes of a sorceress with magic rod in hand. Twilight took notice of her new clothes’ pockets fill with vials and guessed her class would be an alchemist. The first thing Rainbow Dash were the ragged cloak and two new daggers in her, from the athlete’s experience she knew she was a rouge. Fluttershy’s new tunic look sylvan in design and had a longbow and a leather quiver arrow of mounted on her back. Rarity examined the white robes of her priestess class and admitted they somehow complimented her new skin tone.

“This is so awesome.” Rainbow said.

It was the only words Pinkie’s friends could say before the pink hair teen cut them off again.

“And so, the adventures of the Order of the Rainboom begins! Onwards!” Pinkie yelled.

Pinkie tried to peer into the well, but her frame was keeping her from going too far in. "This seems to just be a spawning point Pinkie..." Sunset stated as she tried to find a good grasp on her staff. "...what makes you think something is down there?" "The glowing? You don't just glow like that unless you got something of value. Maybe a lost crown or some magical, blueberry based artifact." 15233322223111.content:
“I got an idea.” Twilight said.

The other six blue adventurers turned to their friend in curiosity.

“I can probably make a salve that can widen the entryway.” She answered, already mixing components together.

Once Twilight’s potion was completed, she applied to the well, hoping to dissolve the stones to give the girls better access. It worked as intend but had an unforeseen consequence: the ground around the well began to shake and sink rapidly! The humane 7 had to fall back a distance to avoid getting claimed by the sinkhole. Five seconds later, the rumbling was over as quickly it began. There was a bigger hole around 30 feet in diameter that was still shining as brightly as before.

“Awesome!” Pinkie said excitedly but then realized, “Uhh, any idea on how we’re going to get down there?”

“Well,” Sunset answered, “I guess the chasm is about 15 feet deep, we’re going to need some rope to climb down.”

The girls were busy looking at their character abilities, trying to scroll through the various menus until, Rainbow, “I got it,” Rainbow Dash said as was able to pull out good length of rope from her cloak. “We can climb down.”

Rainbow tied one end of the rope to a stake and then tossed the other end down the hole. The blue teens held on to the rope tightly and began their descent downward to the bottom of the hole. Rainbow’s rope didn’t reach the bottom, leaving a 6-foot drop. Pinkie went down first, and then used her blue belly as a landing pad for the other girls. Fluttershy was the last one down and she was panting.

“So, is everyone ready?” Pinkie getting back up.

“Ready!” The other girls answered, except Fluttershy was still panting from the drop.

The humane 7, with Pinkie, Applejack, and Rainbow Dash taking up the front line followed by Twilight, Sunset Shimmer, Rarity, and a reluctant Fluttershy, entered the glowing tunnel anxious in preparation of their first challenge:

152333222231111.content:
The light source was getting closer, and soon they had seen the source of the azure glow. An incredibly large pile of blue treasures.

“Woah!” Applejack commented.

“It’s beautiful!” Rarity, said eyes wide open at the beauty of the loot.

“Wow! Shiny!” Pinkie said.

All that was between the Order of the Rainboom and the loot was a long cavern pathway over a narrow karst trench.

“Wait anyone hear that?” Fluttershy questioned.

“Sounded like it came from… below us.” Rainbow answered

The blue adventurers looked down past their bellies and saw that stone Bridgeway they were standing on was starting to crack due to the extra weight. All it took was one more step and the walkway collapsed with blue teens falling. The girls screamed and fell and with a resounding thud into the dark chasm below.

“Anybody got a light?” Twilight grumbled.

Sunset quickly tapped her staff to the floor, providing a quick illumination. The blue girls were quick to get up and wipe the dust from their clothes and armor, but soon found themselves in a lair of giant spiders and rats.

“Uh-oh!” Sunset said.

One of the rats would have slashed the girls with a powerful claw attack, but Applejack managed to raise her shield up just in time to block the attack. The shield extended itself to protect the rest of the girls. Pinkie and Rainbow took the initiative, flanking the closest rat they could and slashing the head and left side respectively, while Applejack kept the other girls protected with her shield.

“Uh, a little help?” AJ asked the four other adventurers behind her.

Among those four Sunset was the only one who had gotten on her feet, as Twilight, Rarity, and Fluttershy were in shock. The sorceress took aim with her rod and fired a bolt of lightning at the beast. The beast was on its final legs, but it took a second swipe from Pinkie’s hatchet for the beast to fall.

“One down, and many more to go.” Pinkie cockily said.

15331111121221122121211211.content:
As Berry had pointed out, someone was rolling towards them. She seemed about as big as Applebloom, though it was clear she was more used to her berry body. "Ya said ya wanted me to come round to the house." "I did Blue Seed, we have a new farmhand that needs to be shown around." Blue looked to where Berry was looking, eager to see the new help. When the two pairs of eyes met, both girls grew still and stared. All was silent for a minute until both girls rolled right up to each other. "Cousin!" Both gleefully shouted. As they (tried to) greet each other, the three off to the side looked to one another.

"Why do they think their cousins?" Berry asked, "Did you two say anything like this to them?" Both True and Juicy shook their heads, thought Juicy had a bad idea. She knew it was impossible, but she had to mention it. "What if they were cousins before we...berried them?" "If they were..." True said, "....then they shouldn't remember. Then again, who knows what could be up with them?" Berry watched the two girls, they seemed unsurprised at the others form.
15331111121221122121211211.title: Berrybloom and Blue Seeds are reunited

choices: Seeds had told Bloom the truth of the matter

153311111212211221212112111.content:
"Look, they seem not to be remembering anything else. If we can keep it that way, there'll be no issues. Let handle this, if a problem arises, Ive got some stuff to help them 'remember' a bit differently." Berry stated, using airquotes to make her point on "remember".

"Alright, but's on you now," Juicy said. "I've gotta get ready for work myself, I'll try and be back later. See you girls until then." And off she rolled.

"You better get going too, I don't need any more hassles," Berry said, facing True with a furrowed brow.

"Fine fine. But she's still off at 5 and you know 'll be back for her."

"We'll see about that. Now off with you." And with that, True Blue made her way home, to patiently wait out her berry buddy. Berry then turned to the two "cousins" who seemed t be chatting up a small storm. It was hard to see what they were saying, but it was something exciting by the looks on their faces. "maybe I spoke to soon on the matter..."

Berry watched as the two rolled off, calling out, "Come back to the house when year shifts are over. Ah'll have something special for you two."

15331111121221122121211211122.content:
And so, Blue Seeds guided Berrybloom around the grounds, explaining the importance of certain buildings and the key roles of her new job.

"As you can see cousin, the berries need to be handled with extra care in this sector due to the type of juice they produce." Blue pointed out as they passed a few plots of lands. "These berries tend to make for some more..."potent" goods as Berry puts it."

"Whatt'ya reckon she means be that?" Bloom asked.

"Beats me. That part is above our pay grade. Now, you'll start over in the next few fields over, seeing as those berries are the easier ones to handle. I bet if you do really well, Berry will get you working in the same fields as me in no time."

"You really think so?"

"I'll put in a good word. Now, it's time for you to start. Come find me when the shift is over." With a nod, Blue Seeds was off to her own sector to work. Berrybloom rolled inot the appropriate field and joined a few other hands in gathering the berries.

She started rolling her way to the silo when she heard someone calling her name. "Berrybloom!" She looked to the voice and saw Blue Seed waving at her. "Hey cousin!" Bloom said as she rolled towards her, "What's up?" "Well it's almost 5, so our shifts are over. Ah see ya have one last basket to bring though, so ah'll let ya do that. Just don't forget that Berry wanted to give us something over at the house."

Berry smiled as she saw Blue and Bloom rolling towards the house. Though she did have a look of annoyance as True Blue was inside waiting for Blue. "Come in girls, I promise this won't take too long." The two nodded and rolled in. Bloom looked around the house, noticing it was a little bigger the Juicy's. As she looked around True had rolled over to Blue and the two were hugging. "So what did yah'll want to show us Berry?" Blue asked as True snuggled into her.

15331111121221122121211211122121.content:
Berrybloom took a step (or rather a roll) forward nervously. "Um... there was something odd that happened when Juicy Seconds helped me gain my memories back." Berry nodded, "I thought so, tell me about it so we can disprove it." Berrybloom rolled to the large couch and sat down. "Well, at first the clear. Ah was working, tending loads of berrybushes like nothing was wrong. But the bushes almost seemed to be covering something. Ah swear it was a tree, and ah could almost see fruit growing on it." "Were these fruits blueberries cousion?" Blue asked, worried for her cousin. "No....ah can't remember what it was but it certainly wasn't blueberries."

Berry nodded and looked to True. "Well Bloom, that certainly doesn't sound good. While she won't admit it, Blue Seed had a similar problem when she first started working here. By the time she told us about it, she had been questioning her berrygirl life." True nodded, "She even tried to stay away from me, thinking I had done something horrible to her." Berry cleared her throat, bringing focus back to her. "However, she has long since been cleansed of the horrible thoughts. You however seem to be in the first stage so this can be easy." Berry took a breath, as if contemplating her next words. "I'm going to put you into a trance. You will be brought back to the field in question. You will need to destroy the tree yourself or you will keep doubting the truth." Needless to say, Berrybloom was nervous. "What if ah can't do it? What if ah get stuck." Blue Seed rolled to her cousion, "Don't worry, we'll be by your side." "Alright...let's do this."

153311111212211221212112111221212.content:
Berry Sweet rolled over to a cabinet and retrieved a small pocket watch. Returning to the others, she snatched the end of the chain of the watch and let the main piece swing freely.

"Now Berrybloom, just follow my watch and relax," Berry started, slowly swinging the watch back and forth. Bloom watched fidning her eyes beginning to drag downwards. "That's right, just keep relaxing and find yourself at peace." Gently, Bloom found herself nodding off, her mind opening up to whatever voice that was to lead her.

"Alright Berrbloom, imagine the field we talked about earlier, make it clear in your mind and tell us what you see."

"Ah' see the fields alright. Its filled with the berry bushes...and there! It's the tree with the funny-lookin' fruit."

"Good good. Now, knock that tree down!"

"I...i can;t, there's someone blockin' the tree. She's not one of us. She's tall, with orange skin and...and looks kinda familiar..."

1533111112122112212121121112212121.content:
"Well she shouldn't look familiar if she isn't one of us!" Berry Sweet said, "She's just someting keeping you from your berry life. But soon, she'll be helping you break down the very tree she's protecting."
"What do yah mean by that?" Berrybloom asked, curious to where this was going. "She may seem strong, but her will is weak. There are blueberries all around you, there should be just enough." "Enough to what Berry?" Berry's voice grew silent for a moment. "Those berries are your life as a berrygirl. They represent you trying to stay a berrygirl just like that tree is the doubt of such. Get that girl to eat the berries and she'll stop fighting you." Berrybloom nodded, she was a little unsettled about forcing blueberry happiness onto someone but she had her friends to think about. Berrybloom picked a few berries and started rolling towards the tree. The orange girl heard her coming and looked towards her.

"Applebloom....what are ya doing here?" The girl's voice was so familiar, but Berrybloom tried to not notice. "Mah name ain't Applebloom miss, it's Berrybloom." The girl seemed a little upset, "You've already forgotten me, haven't ya? Ya can't even recognize yer own sister." Berrybloom just looked to the girl as if she was crazy. "Ya can't be mah sister, yah'll ain't even a berrygirl." The girl was getting quite upset and took a step forward. "Neither are you...at least ya shouldn't be." The girl motioned to the miles of berry bushes around them. "The only thing these things are growin is lies. Choking out the truth that yah'll don't belong with them." "Don't listen to her Berrybloom!" Blue Seed's voice said, "Yah know who ya are and she doesn't!" Now the girl seemed mad, getting right up to Bloom. "Don't yah'll even think about listening to another word these filthy liars are spouting! Yah'll are mah..."

Before the girl could finish, Berrybloom rolled right on top of her. "Now listen here!" The berrygirl yelled in anger, "Ah don't know who yah'll think ya are, but there are three things yah'll should know: Ah'm a berrygirl, mah mind ain't a book to rewrite, and no one, ah repeat NO ONE INSULTS MAH FAMILY!"

With that, Berrybloom knocked the girl right into the berry bushes. Bloom could hear the sound of involuntary swallowing.

15331111121221122121211211122121212.content:
Despite the gulps she heard, the figure claiming to be her "sister" rose quickly to her feet, a righteous anger burning in her eyes that could start wildfires at a single glance. Fists balled in a fit of honest-to-goodness rage, the stranger leaped with incredible speed and squarely landed a flying kick against Berrybloom, sending her rolling across the fields. She made for a running start, keeping the pace going and continuing her combo with another flying kick followed by a slam.

"If y'all ain't gonna listen to sense, then maybe I can beat it into ya!" the stranger boomed, her voice quivering with anger, but also an hoest love for someone who clearly wasn't thinking straight.

"Don't take that beating laying down Berrybloom! Show er your prowess!" Berry Sweet raged, her teeth sharply gritting in her mouth.

"Shut up you pretentious liar! Nobody beats the Element of Honesty, especially the likes of your cowardice self!" The stranger roared, her hands in a frenzy of ripping apart the fields before her, feet thrashing and crushing anything beneath them.

"How dare you destroy my hard work! You'll pay dearly for this!" Berry Sweet raged back, her tantrum reaching a fever-pitch. It was at those precise words Berrybloom's mind clicked.

"Your hard work!? You snake! I can't believe you!" Berrybloom screeched, her memories slowly rejoining her mind. It was all coming back: her real life, er sister fighting her, everything.

"Berrybloom, finish that wentch off! We've no time for games!" Berry Sweet commanded.

"You have no sway over my sister now you creep! Applebloom is an Apple through and through and that's something you can never shake!" the once stranger bellowed in pride.

"You tell 'em Applejack!" Applebloom cheered.

1533111112122112212121121112212121212.content:
"Blue Seeds, we haven't any time ot waste in ensuring our friend stays with us! Go fetch some goods from the kitchen and fill Berrybloom as full as you can!" Berry Sweet shouted, her fingers pointing just down the hall.

"Yes Ma'am!' Blue sharply replied, making her way down the passage with record time. Forcing herself into the cupboards and fridge, Blue drudged up as much her hands could carry, jars and boxes full of berry goods. Rushing back, she grabbed the first thing her hands could grapple and shoved it down Applebloom's throat.

Back in the depths of her mind, Applebloom was still rolling her poor berried memory of er sister along, gaining good groud and was coming up fast on the apple tree. Without warning, the bushes surrounding them took to a more vicious nature, growing rapidly and branches reaching out, trying to ensnare the two berries on the run.

"Applejack!" Applebloom screamed, rushing faster and faster, doing her best to outpace the the danger consuming her.

"Keep...rollin'...sugarcube...I believe...in you," Applejack stammered out, trying to keep her head on straight. All about them, the bushes loomed, growing over into a fearful maze of bushes and branches, snaking vines and white flowers blooming along the walls of leaves. In the air, Berry Sweet's haughty laughter filled the space.

"Yeah Berrybloom, keep running! But you'll never escape our grasp! You're ours now, and no one leaves us once they're a part of us."

"We're almost there sis, just a few more...." At that instant, a large flower opened up, cutting off their direct path. "No! Gotta find a way around...." The bushes and branches had caught up with them and had begun to enclose the two. "What? This can't be happening!?" "Oh it is Berrybloom, like I said: Once you're one of us, your a berrygirl forever." Vines began to slither up too the two as Applebloom looked to her sister. She had almost grown as big as Berry Sweet. "Sis...ah'm so sorry...." With that, the vines began to slowly wrap around the two, keeping them still. A sound from the flowers caught Appleblooms attention. A blue mist had begun to spray out and she knew what was coming. "Just relax my dear.... " Berry's voice echoed sweetly "Forget your meaningless past. You are one of us now and forever." Applebloom looked to her sister in hope, but was lost at what she saw. Her sister was breathing in the mist with a smile and munching on what she knew was a blueberry. Applebloom didn't speak for fear she would intake the mist. As the girl took a deep breath of the mist, the bushes slowly returned to normal. As they shrunk back, she noticed the tree was gone. In it's place were all her berrygirl friends. 15331111121221122121211211122121212121.title: THe maze comsumes the two Apples

153311111212211221212112111221212121211.content:
And with a frightening start, Applebloom awoke from her dreams, jolting upright in a terrible coldsweat and her heart pounding inside her, much like a beast beating its cage for the freedom it yearns. The sunshine from her window streamed down onto her face, warming it with a gentle glow and signalling the arrival of the morning. Clutching her chest with an open hand, Applebloom breathed slowly, trying to regain her composure before glancing down at herself. Everything seemed normal, no weird colors or abnormalities of her form. She swished her tongue about her mouth, nothing but the taste of morning breath. Sighing in relief that the dream had passed and she truly was in the real world, she leaped out of bed and made her way down the stairs to the kitchen. Something smelled particularly delicious this morning, the hot scent of sweet maple and fruit hung in the air.

Reaching the base of the stairwell, Applebloom clutched the edge of the wall, peering cautiously around the corner. There, standing before the stove with a griddle in hand, was her dear sister Applejack, perfectly as human as ever. Overcome with emotion, Applebloom streaked across the kitchen and tackled into AJ with a vice-tight grip.

"Woah! Easy there Sugarcube! What's gotten into you this mornin'?"

"Oh Applejack! I had the worst nightmare last night! I'm just so glad everything's back to normal."

"Musta' been somethin' awful to spook ya so bad. Well, we can talk all about it over breakfast. I'm makin' yer favorite, Apple nd Blueberry panckakes..." Applejack barely finished her sentence before being exposed to a deafening scream of fear and watching as her sister bolted out into the orchards, hollerin' loud enough to raise the dead.

"Was it somethin' Ah' said?" She asked, scratching the back of her head.
153311111212211221212112111221212121211.title: Epilogue

Everyone was there: Beery Sweet, Violet Hue, True Blue, Juicy Seconds and her cousin Blue Seeds all surrounded her in a tight embrace.

"What...what happened to me in there?" Berrybloom asked in confusion, her head still wrapped in the blue mental fog.

"Oh! We were so worried! You were making all kinds of weird sounds and saying crazy stuff!" Violet Hue cried out, overcome with her falsetto of worry.

"but the important thing is that we've got all your memories nice and square. You're with us and that's all that matters now," Berry Sweet grinned, a tiny snicker ending her words.

"Well, Ah' feel just awful havin' made y'all worry so much," Bloom retorted, gently kicking her feet in a mild sense of shame.

"It's all right Berrybloom, we are just glad ot have you back. Now how aout we all go out and do something fun?" Berry Sweet replied.

"You've got it sweet cheeks," Violet blushed, snatching Berrybloom's mouth into a passionate kiss. Bloom didn't resist, sucking hard and fast against her lovers' lips. Violet moaned quietly, happily taking her "friend" closer and basking in her warmth.

"Mmm...you taste so sweet. How did you get so...delicious?" Bloom asked, softly pecking at Violet's bloated cheeks, licking up a few remains of cobbler left on her face.

"I've had a lot of practice with the others. You didn't think we hadn't tried this kind of stuff already?"

"Ah' figured, but now Ah' know just how well they trained y'all." Bloom giggled before snuggling close, breathing softly with Violet close in her tiny hands.

1533111112122112212121121112212121212122.content:
In the days following her time with Violet Hue, Berrybloom had come to truly understand her place in this strange new world: to serve on the farm as she knew how and to give herself passionately to Violet. Some were upset at how well Violet had bonded with what was once thought to be an equally-distributed berrygirl, though others seemed to understand the decision. Juicy was torn torn the most, but seemed to recover quickly from the loss of potential with Bloom. As it was, Bloom herself was out on her own in the town finally free from the watchful gaze of her overbearing friends.

"Ah, what a wonderful town we have," she sid after taking a deep inhale of the intoxicating aroma floating through the streets. Something called out to her at that very moment, as though she could hear the cries of a thousand voices before they were silenced. Not understanding why she felt this sudden disturbance and calling, she simply did what she felt was right and made her way back to where her friends had found her, that grassy hillside. Upon arriving, Berrybloom was greeted by a strange sight.

Berrybloom kept rolling for a moment until she realized there was more then one color in the blue grass. She looked towards the form, seeing rise and fall in breathing. It was someone, but it certainly wasn't a berrygirl. Already Berrybloom was curious, but now she was questioning every second. "Maybe this was why ah was sent here, now who is this?" Now speaking aloud, Berrybloom said to the supposedly sleeping figure, "Miss? Are yah'll alright?"

What Berrybloom didn't realize was that this was someone she knew quite well. At least....someone she knew in her past life.

The figure stirred slowly, raising its hand and shaking its head in a sleepy confusion. "Uh...where...am I...?" it asked, bleary-eyed and groggy.

"You're with me, near the town I live in," Bloom spoke to her, trying to lend a hand.

"Applebloom...? Is that you" the new being questioned.

"Huh? No my name is Berrybloom, who are y'all?"

"Whuh? My name is Sweetie Belle," the person spoke, picking herself up off the ground and finally taking a good look at Berrybloom. She gasped terribly at the site. a giant fruit lady with the head of her friend. She screamed fiercely, throwing up her hands and running inot the distance.

"What! Come back!" Berrybloom called out, giving pursuit.

1533111112122112212121121112212121212122.content: It was not easy to spot under the blue-tinted grass but it was visible, rising above the line. It seemed to be a large chest, though what it was doing here was a mystery. There were no marks on the ground showing anyberry had come by to drop it, but there was no dust on it so it couldn't have been here long. Curious, Berrybloom looked over the chest. It was a beautiful violet hue and was intricately carved. Designs of blueberries covered it and it appeared smooth to the touch. Berrybloom was confused, not knowing what to do with this odd chest. A good part of her wanted to show this to the others before she opened it. There wasn't anything seemingly wrong with the chest but she didn't want to risk anything horrible to happen, like when she almost lost her memory. Then again, there was a small part of her that enjoyed this time she had alone. There was no for seeable need to bother the others with this....still....

1533111112122112212121121112212121212122.content: Deciding it was well worth her time just taking the opportunity of opening the chest to see what was inside, Berrybloom gave herself a nod and rolled over tot he chest. Upon further inspection, it was a simple to clicks away from being opened by sliding the hinges back and flipping the little bar holding them in place. Inside, she was greeted with two objects of impressive stature and design. The first was an ornate crown, saturated in rich blues and purples with small gemstones decorating in around the edges. A large sapphire adorned the front with two small slivers of emerald to look like a blueberry. The other was a scepter or wand made of rare woods and crafted with strange runes and patterns across it, as though it held some arcane magic within. Grabbing both objects in hand and placing the crown atop her head, Berrybloom felt an odd wave of power washing over her.

Her smile waved slightly as she felt an odd gurgle coming from her already large berrybody. With the growth came a sheen across her whole body, making her seem like a true blueberry. Berrybloom could feel the magic coursing through her and decided to see this for herself. Taking a slight leap of faith, she focused her energy until she could see a small mirror in front of her. Berrybloom gasped as she looked at her face, the visible sign that the magic had matured her into a teen face. At first, she thought that was the end of it. But soon, an odd tingling came from the clothes she had been wearing. The mirror had disappeared with Berrybloom's loss of focus. Doing her best to look down, Berrybloom tried to see what the heck was wrong. When she was finally able to see it, Berrybloom's eyes opened wide. Her clothes were changing right in front of her. They were changing from the work clothes she had on from the farm into some sort of royal attire and that wasn't the end. A waxy sheen came upon the clothes, giving off the feeling of actually being a part of her body. "Oh mah...." Berrybloom whispered, questioning how beautiful she looked now. " Ah can tell ya like it." The voice said with a giggle, "Now yah'll look even more like a queen, fitting since ya are one now. Ah do hate to cut and run, but now that yah'll have proven herself ah don't need to stick around." Berrybloom nodded and went back to rolling towards town, more excited then ever to show Violet and the girls.

1533121112222222211121221112112212222211.content:
"Berry the town?!" AJ reflected in fright, her mind beginning its struggles against a new and invading force of her conscious thoughts. "Why in the blue blazes would y'all want to do that?"

"It's simple in all actuality Applejack," Twilight chuckled, tapping the vat with her knuckles. "And you'll understand in time. Just drink up and come see the light we've all found."

"Ain't no way I'm gonna blow up into some silly blueberry like y'all did! And if it's the last thing Ah' do, Ah'll find a cure and fix this mess, just you wait and see!" Applejack shouted back, her voice carrying the remains of her determination along.

"That would so noble of you AJ, if we wanted to be 'cured', but we actually like being this way. If only you'd understand..." Applebloom replied, the ast of her words filled with regret of not having her sister yet under the sway of her collective power. AJ looked down at her predicament: the juice was rising to becoming chest deep and her stomach was out by a decent foot or so. Worse yet, she could feel her butt and breasts taking on liquid plumping and growing with a grand force behind them. She gritted her teeth in frustration, mentally pushing herself to keep everything together, to not let into the voices she could hear calling out for her to join. She wished desperately to cover her ears and concentrate, but between trying to keep herself afloat in the rising pool of juice and her own body beginning to rob her of mobility, she was hard pressed to do much else but try and relax.

Closing her eyes to focus, Applejack breathed deeply, letting her negative energy flow out with her breath. She cringed as her breath took on a distinct taste of the fruit juice she floated in, and a mere swipe of the tongue confirmed her saliva had indeed changed. Still, her mind was set on focusing her thoughts on a singular idea, the one treasure int he world that could not be tainted: a perfect, shining apple. In all its glory, AJ envisioned the majestic red sheen it had and its sweet, yet clean taste and the wonderful crunch it made between her teeth. It was truly something to behold. But, why did it look so...blue?

Forcing her eyes open in shock, Applejack shook her head and tried to collect herself and her bearings. But things were getting harder to remember, especially why she was so...resistant? Yes, that was the word she was looking for, resistant. She was fighting against something, but what was it now? She closed her eyes again to envision her goal. There, in her mind's eyes, appeared something like what she seemed to think was what she had seen: a large blue fruit that glistened in the light, a sweet and clear flavor with a soft smush when bitten. Yes, that exactly what she remembered! And wiith that, Applejack's body relaxed into a perfectly serene state, allowing her to complete her inflation and, as Twilight had said, everythingwas becoming so clear: the plans, her queens and her purpose.

"Is she ready yet Twilight?" Applebloom asked, anxious to see her sibling as wonderful as herself.

"I sense she has joined us. We shall prepare for the draining," Twilight nodded as she pulled a lever, the juice flowing coming to a halt before draining away into unknown stores below. One side of the vat swung openwith a blue AJ rolling forth and greeting the rest with a gentle grin upon her face.

"Greetin's my queens. I am ready to serve with y whole heart and my apologies for takin' so long to see y'all's light."

"Worry not Applejack, all is forgiven and now," Applebloom turned to Twilight, "we can finally put our plans into motion."

"How fast can you get us to the old building?" "I had a spell created that would send me right to it if I felt the shock. I always wanted to try multiple people for a movement." Before Applejack could ask what was going on, the four disappeared in a flash of blue and purple.

"With our powers finally maxed out, what's our best strategy of attack?" Applebloom asked once the five berries returned to Scootaloo's Castle-like home.

"As I see it my queens, the high school could prove to be an excellent base of operation if we can get the student body under us. Our first tactic should be to disable Celestia and Luna from interfering with our usual attacks. Once we have them, we can use their status to ensure the entire student body will be forced into our hands and we can have our tiny army ready to take to the streets," Twilight explained, gesturing her hands as best she could.

"And when should we strike the principals?" Sweetie Belle asked.

"It's growing late, so the most optimal time would be very early tomorrow. If a couple of us can hide in their office before they arrive, we can ambush them and ensure we have just enough time to get our plan in order," Twilight elaborated.

"Then we should rest and prepare ourselves for the morning. Anyone who has people waiting on them, let them know you're sleeping over for the evening. They'll understand tomorrow once the school is under us," Scootaloo commanded, everyone nodding in agreement.

***The Next Day***

A small blue and white vehicle pulled into the schoolyard, two women emerging and making their way to the front doors to unseal the school from its nightly slumber.

"Dear sister, does something...feel off to you?" Luna asked they approached her sister's office.

"Nonsense Luna, it's a beautiful day, what could possibly be wrong?" Celestia teased before the two walked themselves into three large blue orbs.

"Rousing herself from her darkened state, Celestia found herself facing an elegant, grandly-scaled castle in the place where her student had spoken of a high school. Her gaze then wandered down to observe herself: strange appendages replaced her usual hooves and her general body was covered in human clothing consisting of a tasteful dress with the colors of her mane and a pair of golden flats. Raising her hands to her "mane", she found the usually flowing follicles were now resting comfortably by the back of her head.

"She wasn't kidding when she said how alien this all was," Celestia muttered as she stumbled to her feet, slowly making her way up to the front doors of the regal castle before her. She gave a knock, coming to start using her fingers, and there was a response from behind the highly ornate blockage.

"Who goes there?"

"Greetings, I am Princess Celestia of Equestria. I seek my student, Twilight Sparkle, who had come here for a visitation on my behalf. I mean you no harm and only wish for a peaceful visitation to your estate." There was a small silence, Celestia worrying that she would be denied access and may need to employ force, but the original voice spoke again.

"I have been informed we'd be expecting you your Highness. Please, come inside." And with that, the doors slowly swung ipen to reveal a spacious opening hall with two large blue spheres guarding the space.

"What is this...Twilight..." Celestia whispered.

The sphere had a waxy sheen that Celestia couldn't help but feel she knew from somewhere. She would occasionally see hair coming from where the head possibly was. It was quite a long length and seemed to curl up at the ends. Eventually the sphere stopped in front of Celestia, who stared at the face in shock. The skin color had changed and this new shape gave problems, but there was no denying it. "T...Tw...Twilight?!" Was all Celestia could stammer out. The large blue figure smiled at her former teacher. You've blown up like some kind of balloon!""Correction, a blueberry." Twilight2 sighed in happiness as she looked to herself. "Turns out you were right Celestia, we have nothing to fear. 1533121112222222211121221112112212222211.content:
Across the three castles of the pony princesses, many had gathered around to hear the speeches that were expected today. Few had known what new world the two princesses had gone to, but rumors were that it was about as magical as their own.

All of Ponyville had eyes on the balcony as the sounds of royal trumpets began playing. The audience cheered as Twilight came forward, but many gasped at the large blue sphere she had become. She was followed by her dear friends, who had all joined her in blueberry perfection. Next to her stood Queen Applebloom, somehow still in her more human form. "My dear ponies, I can tell you are all very confused at the look of me and my friends. I can assure you all that this is nothing to fear, in fact, it is a cause for joy. Word is being spread across Equestria and the Crystal Empire that we have now gone into relations with a new kingdom: The Blueberry Girl Kingdom!" Ponies gave light claps, but many still looked to the princesses in shock.

Celestia and Luna looked over to Queen Sweetie Belletheir large berry bodies almost matching that of hers, "We have with us right now one of the queens of that very kingdom. She and her fellow royalty had made no small claim to say that they seek peace and they shall have it." Luna saw many ponies, even some of the guard looking at them with frightened. "These new forms are nothing to be afraid of, this is how all those in their kingdom look. This also a near blessing to be in such a form yourself." Sweetie Belle giggled, "You are too kind my dears." The sun and moon princesses bowed their heads in reverence. "We know it many be hard to believe all.of this, but you will soon grow comfortable with this.

The sun glinted of Cadence's crystal berry body and she turned once again to Queen Scootaloo. "In fact, as my dear Twilight has told me, work is already being made on more passageways for citizens of our worlds to cross between each other. So you shall all expect to see even more berrygirls around in the near future. It is quite a shame that the ponies cannot be graced with all three of you at once dear queens." Scootaloo nodded "It is also a pity that Shining Armor stallion could not come." "Well, he's having trouble accepting this new development, but he'll join me and all of us in your warm welcome."

"I know math fellow queens join me in our graditude towards your hospitality. However, we have matters to tend to back home." Applebloom turned to the crowd. "Ah leave yah'll with a wonderful gift that ah know will make yah'll more excited for this."

Three large circles of blue surrounded the three castles, covering all in a 3 miles radius with a blue light. When it disapated, then ponies below cheered, their fears disappeared....and their will would soon follow. The second berrying was upon them all.

With the reason for their meeting now addressed and planned for, the group of royalty decided it was time for them to hit the sack. One by one, the royal berrygirls left their seats and went to the door. The only one left was Twilight1, who was now deep in thought of Pinkie's idea. It was good without question....but something felt missing. There was just some angle in the berry's mind that just wouldn't sit down. "Hmmmm....Sunset did tell me about....maybe...." Still deep in thought, Twilight rolled out of the room and to her bedroom.

The sweet scent of blueberries brought Twilight2 out of her slumber. With a yawn, she felt around herself and took notice of her hands. "Right...so that wasn't a dream. That is both relieving and disturbing at the same time. With no one around her, Twilight2 now felt it was safe to vent her uncertainty about this new development. "Okay...so this world is filled now with big...blueberry girls. I know they seem to only want peace, but I just can't get over the way some of the princesses were looking at me." The scent was once again caressing Twilight2's nose, calling out to her. With a deep breath, Twilight2 got out of bed and put on the blue ensemble of her average human clothes played out for her. "I'll just stay on my hooves...err..toes. I won't let any sugar-coated speeches get the better of me. I will stay completely focused." Twilight2 made her way to the door and walked through it, only to be bounced back by someone already at the door. "Oh I am so sorry." "No need Twilight...." Came a very familiar voice that made Twilight blush. Twilight looked in front of her and saw a berry figure not as large as the princesses but he seemed fairly large. His body seemed to have a mix of armor and cloth as clothing. His face though was what really sold it for our dear equestrian. "F...fl.fl..Flash Sentry?" The being smiled upon Twilight2 chuckled. "Yeah...been awhile...hasn't it? Twilight2 was hesitant what she was feeling, she still remembered what had happened during the whole 'Battle of the Band' fiasco. Despite that though, she still had feelings for him and had made the assumption that the Dazzlings had something to do with his outburst. "Our Princess Twilighthave requested that I accompanyyou while in our world. Flash rolled closer, "All I can say is that I don't mind." Twilight2 blushed even more so, her mind made up over what feeling she was experiencing. She giggled as she stood beside Flash, "Well, we better not keep them waiting. It seems they already started breakfast."

"Ah, Twilight!" Scootaloo called out as the girl came through the door. "We're so glad you could join us for a little morning feast." Applebloom nodded as she gulped down a few blueberry tarts. "Ah think yer really gonna enjoy what we have fer ya today." Twilight2 noticed how some on the princesses snickered and began to feel uneasy again.

1533121112222222211121221112112212222211.content:
"Okay, but just where the heck are we gonna even gonna start searching?" Bon Bon put a hand to her chin in curiosity, wondering that very same thing. Before long, the intercom system clicked on. "Attention students, as you are coming in you may notice the renovations done to the school. I can assure you all that this is nothing to be worried about. Your classes are still in the same rooms as before and you all should go to them as usual." As Celestia's voice ended, a grin of certainty came to Bon Bon's face. "I think Principal Celestia's office might be a nice....Hey!" Bon Bon grabbed her friend's arm before she could walk away. "Just where do you think you're going?" "Celestia said there was nothing to worry about, so yeah. If I hurry then I might be able to finish my math before...." Lyra realized her words were pointless as Bon Bon pulled her along.

[A minute or so later]

"How long do you intend to drag me along like this? My shoes are starting to scuff up." "We're almost there, stop being a whiner." Lyra rolled her eyes, but said nothing. As the two neared where they remembered the Principal's office was, they could hear laughing coming from inside. Peeking through the window, Bon Bon's eyes opened wide at the sight she was witnessing. "Lyra...are you seeing this?" "If by this you mean the blue sphere with a face frighteningly similar to Applejack's sister then yes." The big blueberry, not noticing the peeps, rolled off into the conjoining hallway that led to a few lounges and the Vice Principal's office. "Ya know, maybe Celestia might have been lying to us about the whole renovation." "Only one way to find out...." Bon Bon said as she slowly opened the door. "Wait Bonny, what if we get caught or something happens to us?" "First, you know I hate that nickname. Secondly, nothing will happen if we're careful. Now come on." The two entered the office and crept down the hallway. A door on the right side of the hallway was ajar, with light and more laughter coming from it.

Really now my Applebloom, I don't believe we need to worry about anything. Our current subjects are all hidden cleverly and Scootaloo is already down in the pump rooms. "Is that Rarity's sister?" Lyra nodded as they crept closer to the door. Once those fountains start spewing the special concoction Twilight made, everything will fall into place. Either they ingest it there or when lunch comes and they get their hands on Pinkie's concoctions and confections. Either way, once we reveal ourselves and begin the spell there will not be a single student here who won't become our blueberry subjects. The two snooping girls looked to each other in fear. "Those two want the school to be like.....them?" Bon Bon whispered as quietly as possible. "What is it wit this school attracting hypno-crazed evil-doers anyways?" Bon Bon lightly slapped Lyra and pointed out, knowing they needed to get this out. "We need Vinyl, with the usual heros seemingly involved in this, she is the only way to get the message out."
