153322212232111122122321211112223111.content:
Pinkie and Fluttershy were kneeling by the doorway to Luna's new office, trying to eavesdrop on whatever the blue aliens were discussing. The only two aliens they could see were Luna and Cheerilee, but Pinkie's senses told her there were more. Luna looked normal at first glance except the outfit she was wearing, but Cheerilee was blue, wearing the same outfit as Luna, and her belly was growing larger and her arms and legs were becoming thicker. The two teens could see large monitors all over the room and a large table containing a 3D topographical map of Canterlot.

"Lieutenant Captain madam, Comm systems are established. Our network is officially connected to the Science Fair." Cheerilee said

"Good send our first transmission to the ship." Luna ordered.

"Yes Mam."

Cheerliee pressed a few a buttons on the keyboards to the left and right of her, and seconds later a large, round, Blueberry Celestia was on the main monitor.

"Ah Lieutenant Captain Luna, I take it progress has been rolling smoothly?" She said

"Indeed captain, We've established the Blue-Berrien colonial office here in the high school, and the factuly has been awakened. I've just received word that Windy Whistles has also awoken some of the mothers outside the high school. We're all set to annouce everything to the people of Earth."

"Excellent work lieutenant," Celestia, flapping her hands as a sign of approval for short, "There is one more thing however, we need to conscript the girls. Thier magic will be vital in bringing order and stability to the colony."

"... I understand Captain. Lieutenant Captain Luna signing off."

Luna, Fluttershy, and Pinkie all knew which seven girls Celestia was referring to, and the latter fled to warn the other girls. Fluttershy tried to flee as well but ended up tripping. The timid teen wasn't hurt as she landed on her hands, but Flutters ended up overhearing something Luna was saying.

"Canterlot's infrastructure is far too primitive," Luna said "But with Blue-Berrien urban planning, we'll more than enough efficent space and housing for the Blue-Berriens who have lost their homes."

"Lost their homes?" Fluttershy asked herself, wondering if things weren't as clear as she thought they were. Unfortunately the teen had lost track of Pinkie and had no idea where she went. So the shy teen wandered the halls trying to find her friends.

Luna sweet talks Flutters into joining her true form of Blueberrien superiority
1533222122321111221223212111122231111.content:
Fluttershy walked through the hallways, keeping her eyes open for any more of those strange blueberry aliens. Chances were that the girls were over at the DNA reader in the gym, or at the very least somewhere nearby. As she wandered the silent halls, the teen couldn't help but think about what she had overheard from Luna. What had she meant when she said that those Blue-Berriens had lost their homes? If the readouts from Twilight and Sunset's machine were anything to go by, then it seemed those blue aliens had made a home here for quite awhile. But then again it was becoming very clear to Fluttershy that she didn't understand the whole story. What little she did know however was enough to create a small feeling of sympathy for the creatures. If they had indeed lost their homes than maybe there were just trying to establish a new one here on Earth. Although more interested in Biology, Fluttershy could recall several horrible atrocities of history that had resulted in the displacement of entire peoples and even worse that came when others didn't raise a finger to help them. "They must be afraid of that inactivity," Fluttershy thought as her already slow speed began to slow down, "Thats why they're using these creept tactics....." It was also rather hard for Fluttershy to forget that she was one of those aliens if only by DNA alone, and her mother as well. That last fact especially hit hard for Fluttershy as this inadvertently meant that by denying the Blue-Berriens, she was denying herself and her family.....

Luna opened the door with a crooked smirk, having seen Fluttershy's approach. "Why Miss Fluttershy, what a suprise to see you." Fluttershy stood tall with clenched fists as she stared ahead into the eyes of the alien woman she had known for so long as human. "Vice Principal Luna, I want to talk with you to better understand what is happening." Luna stepped aside invitingly, though not without a loss on her smirk. "Come on in Miss Fluttershy, but please either call me Leuteniant Captian Luna or just Luna." Fluttershy stepped inside, seeing Cheerliee and so many other female members of the school staff walk, wobble and even slightly roll about the office. A few of the monitors previously noted seemed to show various areas of the schools, with two larger screen focusing on the gym/science fair. "So, Fluttershy, you wish to join our cause to prepare this school and furthermore the town for the coming of our species?" Fluttershy turned to Luna, who was walking over to a chair by the table holding the map of Canterlot. "Sit down dear, you seem rather tense." Fluttershy could feel all of the eyes in the room fall on her for seconds at a time as she sat down, Luna never giving up her smirk. "Luna, we need to talk about...well.....maybe....there must be a better way to announce all of this to the world than just this....I mean....." Luna quickly replaced her smirk with a near motherly smile, taking in a deep breath. "It's alright Fluttershy, take your time." "Well.....this is just all so sudden. And...I know I heard something about your peole being misplaced and...." "....don't forget Miss, you're a Blueberrien yourself." "Well.....I've only found DNA connection recently and....you either knew all along or just found out yourself....." Luna sighed, "Miss Shy, our people are in the process of a mass exodus and this planet is the only planet we could find that has the requirments for us to live here. And yes we are rushing things slightly, but surely you must understand the fear one can feel for being different. You and those seven magical friends of yours. Just think of all the fear and distrust our sudden apperance will cause. That is why you and your friends especially must help everyone see we are worthy of trust.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111.title: Use your brain Flutters

15332221223211112212232121111222311112.content:
"But enough about," Luna said changing back to her smirk, "We appreciate your support, but we request you show your solidarity to our cause by embracing your Blue-Berrien DNA."

"You mean become a..." Fluttershy said, blushing.

"Don't worry Fluttershy, we can personally assure you the process will not harm you." Luna said, beginning to coax the shy teen, "Your new body will be... stronger, more durable, and more sound for the enviroment."

"Sound for the enviroment?" Fluttershy asked, that last one piquing her curiosity.

"Yes," Luna answered, "We Blue-Berriens have used the juice produced in our bodies as a source of clean reliable energy, and as nourishment for the planet's animal life. Pollution is utterly non-existant. Blue-Berriea's natural landscape was lush and clean."

Having her body be enviromental friendly very enticing for Fluttershy. She was blushing at the thought in her mind, the timid girl was seeing the planet be all clean, and the world safe for animals. Such an animal frienly place, it was worth a blue, round, and juice filled body, but before she could say anything but Cheerilee alreted everyone.

"Lieutenant Captain, maam," Cheerilee said noticing the monitors, "We have a situation." Fluttershy noticed the alien's arms and legs were finished being absorbed into Cheerilee's round body.

The monitors showed that word of the women of Canterlot being blueberry aliens had gotten out. Students were trying to escape outside. Fluttershy saw her friends, embrassed. It turned Pinkie accidentally spilled the beans as Fluttershy noted in her friend's worried and embrassed expression and body language.

Luna sighed, the moment was fast approaching, "Cheerilee, I want you to escort miss Fluttershy to the lab and prep her for Blueberrification for me."

"Certainly Lieutenant." Cheerilee saluted, beginning to rolling to escort Fluttershy, who had made her decision and complied.

Luna got the note pad her speech was written on. It was half completed, meaning the alien lieutenant would have to improvise.

153322212232111122122321211112223111122.content:
Luna knew she had to get the message out soon before the fear and distrust already evident in the school took hold of everyone. Typing the commands into the nearest monitors, Luna knew the signal was bouncing towards the Cyanocus and back into as many communication networks as possible. On the non-security monitors whatever channel they were on were replaced by Luna's stern face and glowing hair. Taking one deep breath, Luna began her speech.

Greetings people of Earth. I am sorry to interrupt whatever you were enjoying but this is a message of dire importance to all of us. My name is Lieutenant Captian Luna of the Blue-Berrien Space Force, for those who are unaware, I am indeed an alien. At this moment, my people have been forcibly ousted from our home and we are in desperate need for a new planet to live on. Your planet is seemingly the only one capable of sustaining our kind for untold lengths of space. I can understand that this is sudden, but you must understand that we are at a desperate point in our kind' s time. There is no need to panic, we are a peaceful people and only wish to coexist without causing harm. There will be fear we understand but we can hope that our two people can easily learn to be together.

Luna nodded to those who had taken control of the signal, indicating it was time for the personal message towards Canterlot itself.

To those living in Canterlot, this message is especially towards you. As the truth is coming out, I am afraid I cannot put this off any longer. Several years ago one of the best ships in the Blueberrien Federation at the time, the Starship Cyanocus, suffered a heavy attack. It's crew was forced to abandon it, taking escape pods towards the only planet capable of sustaining us. In the process of coming here, a cosmic ray hit the pods causing an unusual reaction to our alien bodies. We had begun to morph and devolve into a more earthly form, with our memories of our true lives all but gone. These surviors, along with myself and mys sister Captian Celestia, easily integrated into your society and have spent the past years among you unaware of the truth. It is only though a chance entering onto the ship and the work of some of Canterlot High's brightest students that we have realized who and what we are. We would apologize for the deceit if it was intentional. This will not be the last time I make such announcment to you as I will be reviewing our society as the first of many ships of refugees come to Earth, starting with here. That is all for now." As the monitors turned back to what they were before, Luna slumped down into the nearest chair. "That was wonderful Luna." One of the office workers stated, not that Luna could see who. "I do hope the people understand."

From high above in the Cyanocus, the alien Captian chuckled causing her round body to jiggle. "Brilliant sister, not the greatest of speeches but doable. The humans will learn more of thier ever approaching intellectual superiors soon enough."

Applejack sighed as the pick-up carrying herself and her alien sister pulled up to the high school parking lot. The two of them were in the truckbed, and AJ was using the visor berry to command the vehicle telepathically, since trying to drive conventionally would have put the two blueberries in a cramped spot. When the truck came to a stop, Apple Bloom was the first to roll herself off the truck, and then Applejack followed suit, carrying her mother's invention in her hands. Not too long ago, Applejack had heard of Luna's announcement through the visor berry, but she knew there would be panic.

The Blueberry Gasser split itself into two with one half staying with Applejack, and the other half ejected and attached itself to Applebloom's body, with canister on her back and two grips found their way into her hands. The two Blue-Berriens then split up. Applejack herself wobbled forward towards the high school as she guessed her friends were all inside. She was correct in that assumption, in fact the five of them were at the high school. It was because the Blue-Berriens had the doors sent into lockdown when Luna had made her speech. Inside, students were panicking at the reveal with comments ranging from “This is too far out.” to “My mom’s an alien?!” and “Trixie doesn’t want to be a want to be a blueberry.”. The Humane seven were the only one with any sort of plan: get out quickly.

"Okay." Pinkie said, on the home stretch of picking the lock, “One more… There!”

         The coast was clear at first as the Humane girls made their escape, but as they tried to make their way out of the parking lot, the ended up confronted a large round Blue-Berrien wearing an all too familiar Stetson.

“Howdy everyone.” AJ said.

“Ya’ll wonderin why ah’m like this?” Applejack answered.

“Uh…” Rainbow replied, “We’ll just not and said we-”

The farmgirl just cut her off, “We can’t just hide the truth. My mama knew that and this is who ah truly am, a big ol blueberry.”

“Yeah, a blueberry armed with a dangerous alien weapon.” Twilight said, notching the gasser.

“Don’t worry, this ol’ thing will help ya reach y'all's true self in no time.” Applejack assured, aiming the nozzle at her friends.

"Maybe things will work out without the aliens…" Rarity pleaded.

"There ain’t gonna be no peace!” AJ answered back, “And Ah ain't here for arguing! Just think about it, the government is gonna barge in here, put everything in lockdown, and take everyone in chains. We havta show solidarity." The conversation ended right then and there as Applejack pulled the trigger on the gasser, blasting…

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Applejack watched as the blue gas began to ensnare Sunset and Twilight, with the three other members of the group left to stare at the actions of their friend. She knew that if there was anyone who could stop what she and whatever else her fellow Blue-Berrians were going to do, it was going to be the duo that was now slouching and coughing with the blue mist around them. With the trigger still pulled on the gasser, AJ continued the spray of blueberry gas until her targets were almost obscured. The sounds of the two girls breathing were soon all that there was to prove they were there as Applejack turned to RD, Rarity and Pinkie. The trio glanced to one another with worried faces as they realized AJ was really serious about this.

With a sudden burst of energy, Rainbow rushed to the big alien and slammed into her rotund body, causing her to spin about. With the Gasser on her back however, she was still keeping upright, seeing no other course of action, Rainbow shouted out "SCATTER!"

Rarity and Pinkie wasted no time in following Rainbow's orders and the three girls ran off in different directions through the parking lot. Before AJ could reorient herself, they had all vanished with the Visor Berry showing faint footrails and nothing more. "Yah'll just don't get it, do ya?!" AJ shouted towards the cowards. "Well, when the suits and government of this planet come to make yah 'vanish' don't say ah didn't try to give yah a chance yah cowards!" For a moment, Applejack stopped herself as a sudden pain in what was once her chest became clear. Her friends, she just called her best friends cowards. AJ could feel tears beginning to form up before shaking her head. "No....it's like ma said. Folks just ain't gonna understand, ah guess that stems to even mah own kind. That's why ah gotta make em' understand." Applejack turned towards the open town and snorted before turning back to the dissipating cloud of gas.


As the scene had been going on, Twilight had been trying to hold her breath against the cloud. But it was no use, Applejack's suprise attack had given her enough of a wiff. A prickling feeling crawled through the nerd as she could feel the DNA within her unlocking and replicating itself. Already, Twilight could see the color of her skin beginning to meld with the dark blue of the cloud surround her. Trying to keep it out of her mind, she waved her arms about in an attempt to find her fellow victim. "Sunset?" Twilight called out inbetween coughs, "Where are you?" Twilight could hear coughing coming from her right, as well as a sloshing sound beginning to echo from within her body. She could alreaday feel her abdomen pushing and some weight being placed into her limbs. "AJ....please!" Sunset's voice! But, something was wrong. It sounded strange, slightly monotone. What was even happening to her anyways? Sunset didn't have any of the alien DNA inside her, so why was the gas being sprayed at her? Twilight's vision began to spin, the amount of force and pressure being put into her head coming closer and closer to the edge. Before Twilight could say anything more, she began to black out, feeling a bouncy pressure keeping her from hitting the ground as she fell over.

As all of this drama transpired Lieutenant Captain Luna observed the whole thing through the monitors and saw that Sci Twi’s Blue-Berrian DNA had indeed awoken as the gas was clearing. Sunset Shimmer on the other hand seemed unaffected by the gas besides being knocked unconscious.

“Well Sunset did not have any Blue-Berrian DNA to begin with, so something like this was expected to happen.” Luna thought to herself. “Anyway that is four down and three to go.”

Then Luna pressed a button on the side of the visor berry and Sci Twi’s mother Twilight Velvet appeared on the screen where she saw that her Blue-berrian DNA has awoken as well. Her skin had already turned back to the way it was and her body had begun swelling with juice. She also appeared to be in the teacher's lounge with the some of the awoken staff members.

“Twilight Velvet.” Luna said contacting her through the visor berry.

“Of course.” Twilight Velvet replied with a slightly nervous tone of voice.

Then Luna ended the transmission and then pressed a different button on the visor berry and this time Windy Whistles appeared on her screen and noticed that her belly was even bigger than it was when they previously met and noticed that she was outside of Pinkie Pie’s house.

Then Luna ended the transmission and began to sigh with nervousness as she noticed that her body was beginning to fill with juice again.

Luna then looked at the monitors on her desk and saw that Applebloom was heading toward the soccer field where Scootaloo and Sweetie Belle were. Scootaloo was going to text Applebloom as well but when the Blue-berrian madness started the two girls went under the bleachers and used them as a hiding spot.

“Do you think Vice-Principal Luna’s announcement about blueberry aliens was real or was it just one big elaborate joke?” Sweetie Belle asked nervously.

“I don’t know Sweetie Belle she seemed pretty serious to me.” Scootaloo replied anxiously. “Also Luna has not been know to be the joking type.”

“The blueberry aliens are real alright girls.” Said a familiar voice.

Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo then came out from under the bleachers and saw a giant blueberry with a familiar looking face was approaching them.

“Applebloom!?” The two girls said simultaneously shocked at what they were seeing.

“Yep, its me.” Applebloom replied calmly. “Now before you two ask about the device that is attached to my back, I just want to talk things out so that we are all on the same page.”

Scootaloo and Sweetie Belle just gave each other a look and giggled. Speaking about their sisters (along with Pinkie), one of them was about to have an encounter with her Blue-Berrien mother.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Hear Applebloom out

choices: Her Blue-berrian mother
Her Blue-berrian mother plus Blue-berrian Maud
A Blue-berrian family intervention (minus the father)
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Ever since Rainbow Dash told Rarity and Pinkie Pie to scatter, Pinkie quickly took off to the sweet shoppe while trying not to draw attention to herself.

“Okay Pinkie keep together.” Pinkie Pie thought to herself. “Applejack has clearly gone off the blueberry deep end, Twilight has been gassed meaning she will become a blueberry too and Sunset won’t be affected by the gas but she is still at the school most likely unconscious.” “Not to mention that you have no idea where Fluttershy disappeared to and now the earth will soon have its first encounter with extraterrestrial life.” “So just stick to Dashie's plan and figure things out from there.”

In a matter of minutes Pinkie made it to the sweet shoppe and went to the roof so she could see how the town was reacting to the whole Blue-berrien ordeal. While things have not escalated to full blown riots, Pinkie could see the panic and confusion in the expression from the citizens because just like them, she has know idea what will happen next. Just then Pinkie felt her hair vibrating and pulled out her cell phone from her hair to see that it was Rainbow Dash texting her and Rarity in a group chat.

Rainbow Dash: Are you guys okay? Where are you currently at, I’m by the mall.

Rarity: I’m okay and I'm by the amphitheatre.

Pinkie: I’m on the roof of the Sweet Shoppe and fine for now. Also why aren’t you calling us?

Rainbow Dash: Don’t want to risk our calls being traced by Applejack or any other Blue-berrien.

Rarity: So what do we do now?

Rainbow Dash: How about we skip town and lay low at camp everfree?

Rarity: Probably one of our better options, but it will probably too risky if we take the bus and… OH MY GOSH!!

Rainbow Dash: What!?

Pinkie Pie: What happened?!

Rarity: I just realized that in the heat in of the moment of fleeing, we left Sweetie Belle and Scootaloo back at the school!

Rainbow Dash: Oh geez, Applejack probably got to them by now. We really messed up there.

Pinkie Pie: Wait a minute if I have Blue-berrian DNA within me, then that means my sisters must have it within them too I gotta get a hold of them before it's too late!

Rainbow Dash: Okay we’ll rendezvous by Sunset Shimmer’s apartment and figure out our next plan of action, be careful out there.

Rarity: Same to you.

Pinkie Pie: Ditto.

With that the text chat ended which left Pinkie Pie alone with her thoughts… for about fifty seconds. Then her phone started vibrating again and saw that she got another text message. But this time it was from her sister Maud.

Maud: Pinkie I'm at home, want to talk to you about something important.

While Pinkie Pie was relieved to hear from her sister, she thought it was a bit convenient to receive a text from her almost immediately after the group text But she was going to go home to pick up supplies anyway.

*Several minutes later*

“Just remember Pinkie, your house is close to the school and there could possibly be Blue-berrians in your house.” Pinkie Pie said thinking to herself out loud. “Just get what you need from your room, see if Maud is okay and see what she wants to talk about and then you meet up with the others.”

So Pinkie Pie opened the door as quietly as possible and tiptoed into her house. But just as she was halfway to the staircase she heard a voice.

“Hello Pinkanmena.” The voice said in a stern tone.

Pinkie Pie slowly turned around to see that it was..
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Pinkie Pie

choices: Pinkie accept, emotionly broken
Maud, out of guilt, rushes her mother and tells Pinkie to run
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Cloudy Quartz and Maid were standing side-by-side, which should have pleased Pinkie if it wasn't for the fact the two of them were wearing the same unusual suits as Luna and AJ and that thier skin tones only seemed slightly more blue than usual. Pinkie began to sweat, now realizing the purpose of her being here.

"Maud, you lied to me? How could you do that to your own sister?!"

"I never said why I wanted you to come. Just that I wanted to talk about something important."

"Oh...but..."

"Thou shalt cease this arguing, the both of you." Cloudy adjusted her spectacles before stepping forward. "Pinkanmena Diane Pie, you are to cease this running around and hiding and report to Luna this moment."

"But Mom, what if I don't want yo do this? I mean I still have trouble believing this isn't some wacky dream from too much soda and pop rocks again."

"Your interjection does not change that this is the truth. I have finally recalled the purpose for which I was literally put to do and I will not stand by to risk my family unit to fall prey to the vultures of difference that is the local government."

"But what's going on isn't helping and certainly not fun in any way. I can't just put myself up to something taking over everything with such hostility."

Cloudy was prepared to speak again before Maud stepped forward. "It's okay mother. If Pinkie doesn't want to be involved in this, it is her choice." Pinkie's eyes twitched as she heard her sister's monotone voice. "After all, it's not like Pinkie was ever a stranger to being the odd one out of the family. Carving her own path, trying to find what makes her happy....
...even if it meant leaving her family."

"Oh no Maud. Don't even try it with me." Pinkie could already hear her voice quiver as Maud's gaze focused on her harshly. (As harshly as only Pinkie would notice at least) "Maud, you know I didn't just leave you all."

"Well that was sure how it felt like when the next day came and you weren't there to hug me. Or help kiss boulder goodnight. Even when I visited you like during the 'Battle of the Bands' nonsense, you seemed to barely acknowledge my existence."

Pinkie tried to hold herself back, but she could already feel the tears beginning to drop from her eyes.

"Now here you are, once again preparing to flee from your family when they need you most."

Pinkie couldn't stop it, her eyes gushed out as her voice cracked and turned under her cry. "I'm sorry Maud, I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I don't want to make you think that but...Wahhhh, I just...I just....now...." Pinkie continued to blubber and whine under Maud' s gaze while Cloudy smiled at her daughter's broken resistance. "Well Pinky, there is a way you can make it up to your family." Grabbing her visor berry from the nightstand, Cloudy brought Luna up. "Lieutenant Commander Luna, it appears that my daughter has stopped her resistance. I will bring her in as soon as nessacary." "Wonderful news Cloudy Quartz. I hope the others have as much luck as you."

"Now my dear daughter, let us take you to become one with your family again."
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Her Blue-berrian mother plus Blue-berrian Maud

choices: The Blue-Berriens arrive at Sunset's place and stake it out.
Rarity and Rainbow Dash make it to Sunset's first.
Meanwhile with Applejack and Fluttershy at the high school.
Focus on someone else.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
“*sniff* Okay Mom.” Pinkie replied, accepting the embrace of blue berried bellies.

The three-way hug was enough for Pinkie’s Blue-Berrien DNA to activate within her. Her skin began changing from pink to blue and juice was beginning to produce and fill her body up. In only a matter of minutes, Pinkie's stomach matched the size of her mother and sister.

“Pinkie is filling up exceptionally well.” Maud commented, brining a somewhat smile to her sister's face.

The family bonding moment came to an end when Limestone wearing same the outfit and bluing skin tone as Pinkie’s mom & sister.

“Mom!”, she said, “The aeroconvoy’s here!”

“Aero what?” Pinkie quietly asked.

“Right on time! Come along girls.” Cloudy Quartz ordered.

Cloudy Quartz led her daughters out the side to join the other Blue-Berriens. Marble was seen assisting Cookie Crumbles with minor repairs to the Blue-Blueberrien transport vessel that looked like a metallic blue hovering subway train to Pinkie Pie. Not only was the belly of Rarity’s Mom the size of a bean bag chair, but her arms and legs were starting to be absorbed into her body. Neither of those swelling limbs and belly was preventing Cookie Crumbles from putting on the finishing touches.

“Okay, the shields on the aeroconvoy should be optimized now.”

“Only the Cyanocus’s Head of Engineering could have such attention to detail.” Windy Whistles complemented from the pilot’s seat, her body finished rounding out, leaving her head, feet, and hands sticking out.

“Oh! It was nothing! It sure was nice of Captain Celestia to start beaming the equipment down.”

“Yeah! Once my Aerostrider comes to Earth, I’m going to be the first berry to break the sound barrier on this planet!”

“Don’t get too excited ladies, we still have our mission complete.” Cloudy Quartz added turning to Pinkie to question her, “Pinkanmena, do you have any idea where your other friends were off to?”

“Rainbow Dash and Rarity? Uh…” Pinkie answered sheepishly, trying to protect her friends, but when Maud gave another glare to her, she quickly squealed, “We were going to be meeting up at Sunset’s apartment and possibly skip town!”

“Rarity is going to be running away!?” Cookie Crumbles said, motherly fear in her voice.

“Rainbow Dash would never run away!... but…” Windy Whistle said, having the same fear but quickly resolved into courage, “Come on! All aboard everyberry! We got some daughters to rescue!”

Cookie Crumbles and the Pie family entered the aeroconvoy. Once the entry hatched closed, the aeroconvoy hovered off, its destination was Sunset’s apartment.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Pinkie accept, emotionly broken

choices: The girls wait too long, Pinkie leads the blueberrians to the apartment
Rainbow's nerves fray out and the two run out
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Rainbow pinched the blinds back, having seen all she needed to from the outside world. Having gotten to Sunset's apartment first, she had self-appointed herself the lookout, keeping her eyes open for Rarity or Pinkie along with whatever those blueberry aliens back at the school were doing to chase them down. Pulling herself away from the closed window and onto the recliner against the wall, the athlte tried to make sense of the scenery going on outside. Offhand, it seemed that not a lot of people actually believed the broadcast, what few words she heard in her rush over here led her to think they believed it was a simple play or trailer for some homebrewed television the high school was making. Loyal as she may have been, the teen couldn't bring herself to ruin their fantasy and hopes. Besides, a few people seemed to buy it as a few of the shops and houses seemed to be shut down and locked up tight. Rainbow glanced abut the room, trying to take her mind off the situation. Her eyes ran across the somewhat humble decorations and furniture of the apartment, nothing new but nothing really dirt worthless. Upon a coffee table being balanced by an old encyclopedia, Rainbow's eyes fell onto a picture of the group and sighed. This whole blueberry alien crisis was tearing the group of friends apart.

Rainbow had no time to think further as a loud banging echoed from the door, causing Rainbow to flip the chair in fear. "Uhh, housekeeping is already in here." "Rainbow Dash you open up this door right this minute! This is no time for one of your jokes!" "Rarity!" Rainbow rushed to the door, hissing through her teeth as she pulled the fashionista inside. "Don't scare me like that. I thought you were one of those blueberry freaks!"

"Freaks! Have you already forgotten that our friends and technically us are among those 'freaks?" Rainbow facepalmed in realization of Rarity's retort. "Sorry, I'm just freaking out right now. Here we are hiding out and preparing to ditch town while aliens are invading and controlling everyone in the school and town. I'm trying not to loose my cool here." Rainbow pushed against the chair, setting it back up before looking back in Rarity's direction. "Do you know where Pinkie is? Was she behind you or something?" "Darling, if Pinkie was alongside me or behind me, she would gave been first through the door. Besides, the sweet shop is practically on the other side of town." "Never stopped her before." Rainbow said as she rushed about. "She should be here by now regarding her ability to appear at the most unusual of places." Rainbow's body began to tense up as her irises shrunk down. "You don't think...she couldn't have..." Rarity shook her head. "Considering our parents are involved with this in one way or another, I don't know. Pinkie always was touchy with her family." "I'm touchy Rarity, Pinkie loves them as much as Applejack would. And y that logic maybe she's given herself up."

Rarity watched in amazement as the normally cool and collected athlete broke down the way she was. She had to admit that Pinkie was often weak willed on subjects like family, but the way Rainbow was carrying on was so unlike her. Clearly the stress was beginning to get to the poor dear. "Never the less Rainbow, we have to wait for her. She would have done the same for us!" "I know, but what if she..." "Look, Pinkie has a good idea where we'll be going anyways. I say we wait a few minutes more and if she doesn't show up, we run and hope for the best." Rainbow nodded, rocking back and forth as the idea set in.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Rarity and Rainbow Dash make it to Sunset's...

choices: The moms get the girls to listen to reason.
The girls flee, forcing their moms into a pursuit.
Rarity listens while Rainbow flees.
Writer's choice
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Both girls were too stressed to get out of apartment, despite the two of them excessively packing up food, water, blankets, etc.. Rainbow Dash was still near window, prepping their emergency exit and looking for any sign of Pinkie Pie. “Pinkie! Where are you!?” Rainbow quietly groaned.

“She isn’t answering her phone!” Rarity said, giving her missing friend the fifth voice message in the last hour.

Back on the Aeroconvoy, Pinkie’s phone was going off. Pinkie could guess that her friends were trying to reach her but couldn’t tell due her belly obstructing her view. Unfortunately, she was leading the Blue-Berriens straight to the apartment and they were awfully close. When the blue inflating teen caught sight of said apartment, she pointed to it “Alright, they’re in that building!” She said.

“Copy that.” Windy Whistles replied, her bravado she once had beginning to fade.

Pinkie noticed the moms seem anxious about their daughters running away. She guess that was to be expected, alien or not. Pinkie tried to say something to break the tension, but her mother beat her to it.

“Don’t worry,” Cloudy Quartz assured, sensing her fellow Blue-Berriens' anxiety, “The sooner we act, the less likely they will be able to run off and risk getting captured. My family and I will form a security perimeter and get control established; you two go talk to your daughters.”

Cookie Crumbles and Windy Whistles both nodded, leaning their round bodies forward slightly while Maude and Marble placed the Blue-Berrien mothers’ visor berries on their heads. When the Aeroconvoy touched down a few blocks down the road, the two aliens rolled up to Sunset's apartment building while Cloudy Quartz and her daughters got outside to establish Blue-Berrien order. Opening the front door and getting inside was obviously difficult for aliens shaped like large blueberries but the two of them managed. The hallway was tight but had enough space for the two to not smush each other. Rarity’s mother mentally commanded her visor berry to activate an X-Ray visor to locate their daughters within the apartment complex. "The scanner's results says are above us," she said, "and I don’t think these Earth stairs were built for us in our current mass.”

“Agreed,” Rainbow’s mom replied, “We’ll take the elevator.”

Windy Whistles turned her berry visor towards the apartments’ elevators. Much like with Applejack’s phone, the berry visor scanned the elevator and the Blue-Berrien pilot had the system under her control. Without pressing a button, she had both elevators summon the cars down to their level. Cookie Crumbles and Windy Whistles both waddled into each car. Once the women got inside carefully, the elevator doors closed, and the elevator went up.

*A few seconds later*

*Sloosh! Sloosh! Sloosh!*

“What was that!?” Rainbow Dash gasped.

“Sounded like it came from…" Rarity answered, quickly panicking when she realized, "oh no… the hallway!”

Rarity gulped and summoned her courage to investigate the peephole. In the field of vision, the fashionista saw two blueberry women in space suits, wearing blueberry shaped helmets, and by just looking at their faces, she easily identified both of them as her mother and Rainbow Dash’s mom.

“Rainbow!" Rarity yelled in terror, "They’re here!”

“Rarity!” her mother answered, “We just want to talk honey!”
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: The girls wait too long.

choices: Rarity is quickly getting exhausted
The two Mother catch up to the thier kids
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Rarity quickly backed away from the peephole, teeth chattering and her hair beginning to dampen with the very early signs of sweat. Rarity blinked and blinked, her right hand reaching her left arm and pinching at the skin.

"Nothing...yeow...still in the apartment." Her hands continued to move up her arm, but still the nightmare continued. "Rainbow, please tell me you have some sort of plan. Our mothers combined seemed to fill up the entire hallway. Busting through the door certainly isn't an option." Glancing back, Rarity saw that her friend was still sitting beside the upturned chair biting away at her nails. "Rainbow Dash!" Rarity hissed, "Get ahold of yourself and check out the window to see what kind of use the fire escape is in."

It had been years since Rainbow had felt her heart through her chest the way she had now. Maybe it was during Sunset's 'undesirable' years or after, but all Rainbow knew was that, as she slowly slunk back towards the window, it was in fear. Moving her hands to the blinds, Rainbow uncovered then to find a very unwelcome sight. A tubular vehicle she could only describe as a Subway train was blocking the alleyway and an even worse sight was Pinkie standing outside the thing and almost completely blowing up into a Blue-berrien.

"I guess we know what happened to Pinkie now." Rarity didn't bother to guess what Rainbow meant, sighing as she continued to back away. Down to two and with the bold of them becoming more afriad then she had any right to be. And it didn't help that a half sloshing, half knocking sound was coming from the door. "Girls, please open up. We're your mother's. Can't you trust us?"

"Rainbow, is Pinkie... sufficiently rounded shall we say?" "Pretty much a big ball of blue." Before Rainbow could even ask her own question, Rarity rushed towards the window and opened it up. The thin scent of blueberries, reminding them of thier adversaries below and elsewhere. Rainbow, quickly catching onto what Rarity was doing, took a deep breath in an attempt to regain her composure. "We can't take our things if we do this." "As much as I will hate myself for saying this, I don't need it." The door handle (along with the door itself) jiggled about, a clarification sign the Blue-berrien parent we're ready to come in.

Taking a running start, the two girls jumped out of the window just in time for the door behind them to give out. The two aimed themselves right for Pinkie's body and slammed against it. (Thankfully neither had cleats nor high heels.) As Pinkie's physics reacted, the two springboarded back up and over the Aeroconvoy into the street on the other side.

As the two girls hit the pavement, they wasted no time in rushing past the crowd that had gathered and into the town. "Alright Rares." Rainbow glanced to her compatriot as they dashed through. "Here's how this is going to work: we keep running, we don't separate, we don"and't look back, if we see any berry blues then hit overdrive." Rarity nodded, though already she was feeling the air being dragged out of her.

Cookie and Windy rolled towards the window, breaking down the wall. Down below, they could hear and see Pinkie crying against the Areoconvoy. She didn't appear bruised but more likely hurt emotionally more than anything and Maud was rolling alongside her. "Your visor berries should inform you the basics of how the Aeroconvoy works. Cookie and I will go after them. Tell your mother to inform Luna about this." Although more cautiously then thier daughters, the two berries jumped out of the hole and bouced onto the street to roll of towards thier children.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: The girls flee, forcing their moms into a pursuit.

choices: The Areoconvoy blocks Rainbow Dash's path
Rainbow Dash slips on a banana peel causing the two to fall into a pond
Rainbow Dash takes a wrong turn towards a dead end
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
After making their daring escape Rainbow Dash and Rarity were running westward towards camp everfree believing they could lose the blue-berriens in the dense woods. But after ten minutes of running Rarity was starting to slow down, looking like she was going to collapse at any moment.

“*gasp* Rainbow Dash could we stop for a moment so we can our breathe?” Rarity asked while gasping for breathe.

“There’s no time Rarity.” Rainbow Dash quickly responded. “But I have an idea, how do you feel about piggyback rides?”

“I don’t know what this has to do with anyth-whoa.” Rarity said before she was interrupted.

Rainbow Dash hoisted Rarity on to her back while holding on to Rarity’s legs and Rarity held on to Rainbow Dash’s shoulder area.

“Are you gonna be alright?” Rainbow Dash asked curiously.

“I'll manage.” Rarity replied still tried from her running.

Just as Rainbow Dash was about to continue running she started to hear a strange noise in the distance which sounded like a barrel of juice being rolled down a steep hill. Rainbow Dash’s eyes widened with surprise as she realized that it was their blue-berrien mothers catching up to them.

“Okay we got to go now.” Rainbow Dash said in panicked tone. “Legs don’t fail me now.”

Rainbow Dash then activated her geode and took off at super speed and Rarity hung on to Rainbow Dash for dear life. But even with Rainbow’s enhanced speed the sloshing sound did not get farther away, in fact it sounded like it was getting closer. Rainbow dash figured that since she was carrying Rarity on her back, the extra weight was slowing her down so she couldn’t run as fast as she normally does. Rainbow Dash also began to notice that the scenery was becoming less urban with more greenery appearing meaning that the two were getting close to camp everfree.

“Rainbow Dash please stop, you're making this harder than it needs to be.” An approaching voice said which Rainbow Dash recognized as her mother’s voice.

Rainbow Dash then noticed that two large spheres were rolling up right beside her. Rarity saw that it was the moms with Windy Whistles on the right side and Cookie Crumbles on the left side. As the two were rolling beside her Rainbow Dash couldn't tell which was more impressive, that the moms were keeping up with her at this speed or the fact that they were able to roll for so long with any sign of dizziness or nausea.

“This may come as a surprise to you mom, but not all of us are all okay with being turned into fruit.” Rainbow Dash stated in an annoyed tone.

“I agree, even less so about being involved in an alien invasion.” Rarity added.

“Its not an invasion Rarity.” Cookie Crumbles said correcting her daughter.” “If you two would just stop and listen, you'd see that the Blue-berriens have a lot to offer.”

“No thank you, I rather enjoy being able to fit through small spaces and not having juice sloshing around in my body.” Rarity replied uninterested in what her mother was saying. “Also mother, those outfits leave a lot to be desired.”

As Rainbow Dash and Rarity engaged in a high speed argument with their mothers...
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Rarity is quickly getting exhausted

choices: The doors open and Rainbow runs right into the Pie family's grasp
Rainbow slams against the thing and blacks out
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
The overgrown floating subway car roared across the sky, continually curving and bouncing about in it's directions but still flying over the forest itself. Inside the cockpit, Limestone and Marble were at console, fighting for direct control over the Visor-Berry controls while Maud and Cloudy Quartz attempting to comfort the still sobbing Pinkie.

"I mean...I know they mmm must be scared and...and all but...why..."

Maud rolled directly against her sister, rubbing against her flat, violet hair. "It's okay Pinkie, like you say, they are just scared and don't know what to do. Boulder never gave me this much trouble, but then...he is a rock."


"Well, fear is never an excuse for one to be rude to one's friends Maud." Cloudy pointed before turning to the cockpit. "Will you two cease your fighting or am I going to have to punish you?" "No need mom!" Limestone yelled as Marble finally handed over the Visor-Berry, "We see the two running through and woods. Hold on to your juice cause I'm taking her down."


With only a thought, the Aeroconvoy slanted downward into the ground before straightening out at ground level, now resembling an actual runaway subway than a floating alien craft. The transport crashed through the trees before making a hard right into a clearing, just in time for the four racers to come into view.


Rainbow had little time to react as the Aeroconvoy pulled up right in front of her, there was no way she was going to jump over that thing with Rarity on her back and with their mother at direct sides with her, there was no way for her to turn either. And Rarity was too distracted with arguing to bring up her own geode.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: The Areoconvoy blocks Rainbow Dash's path

choices: Windy Whistles and Cookie Crumbles
The Pie sisters with a message from Luna
Captain Celestia?
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
While Cookie Crumbles and Windy Whistles rolled after their daughters, Cloudy Quartz came up with a plan to catch Rainbow Dash and Rarity. The mothers would roll up beside Rainbow Dash which would make her unable to make any quick turns. Then the Pie family would land the areoconvoy would land in the middle of their path and open up the doors which cause Rainbow Dash to enter the ship where Cloudy Quartz would use the ship’s tractor beam to stop Rainbow Dash in their tracks.

However, as Rainbow Dash ran closer to the areoconvoy she crashed into the one sides of the ship (without denting the areoconvoy or causing any major damage to herself or Rarity) instead of entering the ship. Rainbow Dash and Rarity blacked out from the impact and the mothers well as the Pie family cringed from what happened (Maud cringed on the inside).

“I think you may have landed the areoconvoy too far to the right Limestone.” Maud stated in her usual flat voice.

“We will work on proper landings later.” Cloudy Quartz stated. “For now let’s get those two inside and return to Canterlot high.”

With that Windy Whistle and Cloudy Quartz carried their respective daughters into the areoconvoy and the ship which then took off back towards the city.

*5 minutes later*

“Uhhh, did anyone get the number on the thing that hit us?” Rainbow Dash said in a groggy tone.

Rainbow Dash then woke up slowly and saw that she was in what looked like a makeshift jail cell in a strange room. She then saw Rarity laying right next to her and realized that the blue-berriens captured them.

“Rarity, wake up.” Rainbow dash said with some panic in her voice.

“Uhhh, I’m up darling but I could use five more minutes of rest.” Rarity replied groggily as she got up on her feet. “Where are we?”

“I think the blue-berriens captured us and place us in her.” Rainbow Dash stated. “The only good new is that we haven’t swelled up with juice...yet.”

“Well maybe I could try something and---” Rarity said before she stated before she realized that something was missing from around her neck.” “My geode is gone.”

“Aw man, mine is gone too.” Rainbow Dash said in frustration.

Just then the two head a door open up which accompanied by the sound of sloshing juice. As the blue-berrien came into view, Rainbow Dash and Rarity saw that was Pinkie Pie. Rainbow Dash and Rarity then noticed that Pinkie Pie had a sad expression on her face and her normally poofy hair was flat which is never a good sign.

“Um… hey Pinkie Pie.” Rainbow Dash said awkwardly.

“Pinkie Pie darling, we’re sorry about the whole using you as a springboard thing.” Rarity stated trying to apologize. “It was one of those in the heat of the moment kind of deals you know.”

“Uh huh.” Pinkie Pie replied in a depressed tone.

“Listen Pinkie if you were in me and Rarity’s position and one us was a blue-berrien, you probably would’ve came up with the same idea as us,” Rainbow Dash said trying to explain their actions.

“I guess that’s true.” Pinkie Pie replied nonchalantly.

“By the way Pinkie do you know where are geodes are.” Rarity asked curiously.

“Your moms have them.” Pinkie Pie replied. “They said that they will give them back when you are willing to embrace your heritage.”

Just then the doors opened again and the girls saw that it was...
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Rainbow slams against the thing and blacks out

choices: The school cafeteria, with transformed students everywhere
Out into the Canterlot streets, they've already reached into the town!
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
"Hello girls."

Rainbow and Rarity said nothing, merely watching as thier principal squeezed her way into the room with a smug grin on her face. She was certainly larger than Pinkie and even then mothers, Rarity silently amazed that her suit wasn't tearing off.

"So...if Luna is presenting herself as some sort of semi-leader, you're supposed to be the big girl on campus?"

"Correct Rainbow," Celestia said "The big and juicy woman on campus." As if to accentuate her claim, she used her almost non-existent hands to slap at her body, causing it to jiggle vigerously. The Blue-berrien captain let out a sigh before pulling herself back together. "Now girls, I realize this has all been something new. But the time to be shocked is over, how about you two stop this fighting and just let this work?"

"For the same reasons we told our parents, who I know have told you." Rarity said as she stood up in anger and annoyance. "We are refusing for our own personal reasons and thoughts of self and we are not going to be swayed by whatever false promises you or anyone else will make." Folding her arms, she sat back down with a 'humf.'

Celestia said nothing, only keeping her smile as she turned to Rainbow. "I assume she speaks for you too?" The silence that followed her statement gave Celestia the impression that regardless wether or not, Rainbow wasn't saying anything. "Well, I don't blame you girls. Here you are all alone with no one to help you or comfort..."

"Rarity said cut it out." Rainbow gave one more angered glance before turning to the wall the same as Rarity.

"Alright, that was just rude. Honestly you girls are acting like spoiled brats at this point. Why can't you just..."

"Captain Celestia...if I may..." Pinkie interrupted, rolling beside the large Blue-berrien. "I think the girls may finally hush up when they see how peaceful things are starting to fair with thier remaining friends." The strange, cold inflection Pinke gave that word caused the two hold outs to turn thier heads.

"Good idea Pinkie. Seeing thier friends in thier new natural lives may help. How about you girls come and join me on a little tour? I mean it's not like you have much to do in here."

"And what if we get away from you then?" Celestia chuckled at Rarity's claim, only saying that she wouldn't and rolling towards the door. Pinkie followed right behind, giving the two another depressed glance on her way out.

As much as the girls hated to admit it, Celestia was right. The bare, almost colorless room with nothing but the blankets the two were sitting on would not be a great place to stay for long periods. Plus, this would probably be a good chance to see what these aliens had done so far to the school and thier friends.

And so with nothing more to say, the two followed thier jailers out into...
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Captain Celestia?

choices: Celestia's ace in the hole

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
As Rainbow Dash and Rarity followed Celestia and Pinkie Pie, they saw that the makeshift jail cell that they were in was the janitor’s closet in Canterlot High but was transformed by the Blue-berriens. The two students couldn’t help but stare at the strange changes that were being made to the high school along with the Blue-berrien teachers that were making said changes.

“You're probably wondering about the changes to the school.” Celesta said as she rolled along. “We’re making some renovations in order to make the school and eventually the town more spacious for the arrival of our fellow Blue-berriens.”

“You mean your Blue-berriens.” Rainbow Dash remarked. “Also how come you look bigger compared to the others including your sister?”

“Luna had to juice herself for the science fair in order to avoid drawing any unnecessary attention.” Celestia replied. “As for me, I think its due to the fact that my body has gone so long without making juice that my system went into overtime to compensate hence my bigger appearance.” “Though I may need to juice myself pretty soon.”

After another minute of walking through the hallways, Rainbow Dash and Rarity saw that Celestia and Pinkie Pie led them to the cafeteria.

“Why don't you take a look through the glass.” Celestia asked with a grin on her face.

Then Rarity and Rainbow Dash peak through the windows of the cafeteria doors and their eyes widen shock as the cafeteria is filled with blue-berrien students.The two saw some familiar faces who were turned into round fruit like Trixie, Octavia Vinyl Scratch, Derby, Lyra Heartstrings and Bon Bon. Most of them had uncertain and anxious expressions regarding their new looks (except for Derpy who is just rolling around aimlessly and Vinyl Scratch who is just listening to her music) while others were still panicking like Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon. What was even more shocking was that the male students like Flash Sentry, Bulk Biceps and Micro Chips were not round at all and only had a blue skin color.

“I was rather surprised myself with what happened to the male students.” Celestia admitted. “The Blue-berriens were an all-female race so when the blue-berrien DNA awoke within the male students, me and Luna had no idea how to react.”

“Wait, if the Blue-berriens were all female then how do they-.” Rainbow Dash said curiously.

“That is a subject for another time!” Celestia interrupted while blushing slightly. “As you can see most of the students have embraced their heritage, some willingly while most needed some convincing either by us or their mothers.” “Fluttershy in particular was one of our earliest students who decided to embrace who she really was.”

“Wait, Fluttershy is a Blue-berrien now?” Rarity said in shock and confusion.

“Yes, she agreed when she heard how the juice within our bodies can be converted into environmentally friendly energy.” Celestia stated proudly. “Applebloom and her friends have also embraced their heritage, so why don't you two stop resisting and join the rest of your families.”

“I don’t think Twilight had much choice with what happened to her.” Rainbow Dash rebutted.

“I’ll admit Applejack was a bit forceful with her approach, but it was for the best.” Celestia replied.

“Are you sure about that?” Rarity asked sarcastically. “Ever since this whole Blue-berrien mess happened Twilight has been freaking out non stop.” “So forcing her to become a giant fruit could cause an emotional breakdown.”

“Where is Twilight anyway?” Rainbow Dash asked curiously.

“She’s still unconscious.” Pinkie Pie replied. “She is the teacher’s lounge and her mother is looking after her.”

“What about Sunset Shimmer.” Rarity asked with equal curiosity.

“She is still unconscious as well.” Pinkie pie. “She is in the music room and Cheerilee is keeping watch over her.” “Since she doesn't have any Blue-berrien DNA in her, she was unaffected by the gas.”

“Since you two are still acting stubborn, how about I show you two something that will change your mind in a heartbeat.” Celestia said with an even bigger grin on her face.

With that Celestia and Pinkie Pie rolled to the eastside of the school with Rainbow Dash and Rarity reluctantly following unsure of what they were going to see. But whatever it was the two knew it would not be good.

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
“Owww…, my head.”

Sunset Shimmer had finally awoken after passing out from the gasser’s overwhelming presence. The potent gas Sunset was forced to inhale was of a rather strong dosage, leaving her body with several side effects. She sluggishly got herself up while clutching the left half of her aching forehead. She felt disoriented and tired, her eyes struggling to decipher anything out of the light. Sunset guessed she was having one of those “Hangovers” she had heard about in health class a few weeks ago.

“Have you regained consciousness, Sunset?” Cheerilee asked.

“Yeah… I’m just feeling dizzy. That’s all.” Sunset answered calmly once she caught sight of the Blue-Berrien supervising her.
Sunset Shimmer was seemingly unafraid of the sight of an alien blueberry woman in contrast to how acted hours ago, but she struggled to keep herself balanced. Whatever she inhaled was still making changes to the teen’s body. The gasser was designed by Applejack’s mother to make humans’ mind more accepting of Blue-Berriens. The machine did so by inhibiting the brain’s fear reactions while forcibly activating the brain’s trust sensors. Vital scans of Sunset Shimmer from Cheerilee’s Visor Berry showed good progression in teen’s body, and the adverse side effects would be wearing off shortly. Once Sunset’s eyes finally adjusted to the light, she could see clearly taking notice that she was in the music room, and she now wearing the type of spacesuit that she saw Applejack previously wearing.

“Does this mean…?” Sunset asked, tugging the right sleeve of her space spandex.

“Yes, Sunset,” Cheerilee politely answered, “Captain Celestia has conscripted you and your friends into the Blue-Berrien Federation. We will be needing your abilities, to make sure order and harmony can be maintained between nations of Earth and the refugee Blue-Berriens that will have to make this planet their new home. Our actions may seem extreme right now, but we were short on options at this moment.”

After Cheerilee’s explanation, Sunset heard the music room door open before she could answer. The door itself now much larger, and she soon saw two of her blue and round friends, Applejack and Fluttershy enter the room.

“Hi Sunset!” Fluttershy said.

“Hey girls,” Sunset replied and then nervously apologized, “Uh, I’m sorry for us trying to run earlier…”

“Well, don’t worry about it, sugar cube.” Applejack assured her, “It was all for the best in the long run.”

Sunset smiled and hugged both teen blueberry aliens, she couldn’t help but admire her friends so big and round, proudly displaying their alien heritage.

“I’m sorry to break up your reunion for now,” Cheerilee politely interrupted, “but since you’re awake Sunset Shimmer, Captain Celestia has asked your friends to escort you to the…

"Might as well Cheerilee." Applejack said as she pulled away from the hug. "Ah know how freaked out Twi can get. Come on Sunset." The big berrygirl turned and rolled toward the door, which was now enlarged to let big berrys such as herself pass with no problem, Sunset close behind while Fluttershy stayed back.

"Is there any word on Rainbow and Rarity?"

"Yes Miss Fluttershy, Captian Celestia informed me of thing safe coming. She's taking them on a tour now."

Fluttershy sighed with relief before turning to the door and rolling off to catch up with AJ and Sunset. The three wandered the halls in silence, Sunset watching as the colors of the school changed to a more blue palette as they walked further in. That included the few people they passed, mostly teachers/mothers working on paint and size renovations with the only one or two students rolling along as if they had been doing it thier whole lives.

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Twilight Velvet was anxiously looking over her blue, round, daughter. Sci-Twi’s vital scans appeared to be normalized according to her mother’s visor berry. While Twilight Velvet couldn’t be anymore proud of her daughter for such an exceptional growth level, the Blue-Berrien knew how scared to death her daughter must be, from what has happened recently. All she could do right now wait as own her body filled with juice for her daughter to awaken and it wouldn’t be for much longer.

Twilight Sparkle’s eyes groggily opened. She had no idea where she was or what happened to her after Applejack had gassed her. All she could see was

“Twilight, dear?” Her mother asked, trying her best not to frighten her blueberry daughter.

Twilight Sparkle recognized that voice was that of her mother’s. Sci-Twi soon realized what that meant and panicked, trying to get her absorbed legs to get off whatever she was on. Unfortunately, she couldn’t, that’s when she had remembered that Applejack had gassed with that invention of hers.

“No! What do you want with me!?” Twilight asked.

“It’s okay sweetie, there’s no need to be afraid.” Twilight Velvet tried to assure her, rolling her blueberry body forward so she would be positioned face to face with her daughter, “There’s no reason to be afraid sweetie. I’m still your mother. I’ll admit the situation leading up to this has been out of anyberry’s control, but we Blue-Berriens are not a violent race.”

“Then… who are you really?”

Twilight Velvet understood the question, knowing that her daughter was referring to her past. She answered, “Mm… I am one of the scientists selected for Blue-Berriea’s colonization mission. I was a professor of astrophysics at Brightwell. My discoveries had helped locate this very planet!”

“You were a scientist?” Twilight was surprised.

“Yes! Where did you think your passion for science came from?” Twilight Velvet answered proudly.

The two’s conversation was interrupted when Twilight Velvet’s berry visor received a transmission. It was Sunset Shimmer, Fluttershy, and Applejack at the door to the teacher’s lounge.

“Um Ms. Velvet, can we come in?” Sunset Shimmer asked.

The doorway opening was all the confirmation the girls needed to enter, and they made their way inside. Sci-Twi tried to turn her body to see who it was, but she was struggling to move herself. Twilight Velvet helped her daughter by leaning her own body to help rotate Sci-Twi so she could see her friends.

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
As Sunset Shimmer, Fluttershy and Applejack entered the teacher’s lounge, Twilight Velvet couldn’t help but notice that her daughter looked slightly bigger compared to her Blue-Berrien friends.

“Hey Twilight how are you holding up?” Sunset asked.

“I’m fine.” Twilight replied trying to put on a brave front.

Then Sunset subconsciously activated her geode’s power and heard Twilight inner thoughts which only consisted of crying, screaming and insane laughing. Suffice it to say, Twilight was an emotional trainwreck on the inside and was barely holding it together on the outside.

“Look Twilight I know you feel like things are spiraling out of control, but you're not the only one who feels like that." Sunset stated. “Heck, there are still a few things that I am uncertain about.”

“Like what?” Fluttershy asked curiously.

“Well I know Cheerilee said that the Blue-Berriens will need our magic to help maintain peace, but equestrian magic is already unpredictable in this world.” Sunset explained. “You throw blueberry aliens into the mix and who knows what will happen.”

“I haven’t really thought about that.” Twilight said as she pondered the differently possibilities.

“We’ll cross that bridge when we get there.” Applejack stated. “Twilight I’m sorry for what happened at the parking lot, I’ll admit I may have been a bit forceful.”

“Apology accepted Applejack.” Twilight said after seeing the guilt in Applejack’s eyes. “But you owe me and Sunset a solid.”

“Fair enough.” Applejack replied while looking away slightly.

“Twilight, we’ll get through this ordeal just like we do with every magic-related problem, together.” Fluttershy said with confidence in her voice.

“Your right Fluttershy, we'll get through this together.” Twilight said in a calmer tone of voice. “I just wish, I could know more about the Blue-berriens so I won't feel overwhelmed.”

“Don't worry sweetie, once Rainbow Dash and Rarity embrace their heritage we are planning on showing you girls a video which will show the history and culture of our people.” Twilight Velvet explained.

Just then Twilight Velvet’s Visor Berry received a message from Captain Celestia.

“Applejack and Fluttershy, Captain Celestia needs your assistance at the east side of the school.” Twilight Velvet stated. “Apparently she needs help persuading Rainbow Dash and Rarity to our cause.”

“We’re on our way.” Applejack and Fluttershy said at the sametime.

“Sunset why don’t you stay with me and Twilight, she is going to need help learning how to move when she is big and round.” Twilight Velvet asked.

“Sure thing.” Sunset replied happily.

With that Applejack and Fluttershy rolled their way out of the teacher’s lounge to meet up with Captain Celestia, while Twilight Velvet helps her daughter in Blue-Berrien mobility with Sunset’s assistance.

The rounded body of Lieutenant Captain Luna rolled on, having regained the mass she lost from her juicing. She knew there was work that had to be done as she made her way back to the communication room that was once her office, back when the alien still thought she was human. The other Blue-Berriens currently presently were Cheerilee who was conversating with two members of the Cyanocus medical staff, Nurse Redheart and Fluttershy’s mother. Luna could tell how happy they were now they were they were their true selves once again. None of the less, the Blue-Berrien Lieutenant cleared her throat to get her their attention. The trio of berry women’s juices jiggled as they hurriedly assemblemed into a linear formation to salute Luna.

“Progress report.” She commanded, “Defense progress?”

“The security barrier fields are ready to be installed first thing tomorrow, and we’ve received word that mass production on Dr. Pear Butter’s gasser.” Cheerilee answered.

“Excellent. And what about the students?”

“The only children the medical staff have examined so far are Applejack, Apple Bloom and her friends, Cloudy Quartz's daughters, and my own daughter.” Fluttershy’s mother replied, “Their bodies have all adapted perfectly to their now awaken Blue-Berrien genetics with a clean bill of health. Their diameters, skin elasticity, juice production, and other vital signs are at excellent levels. We would like to begin examination of the other students at your command.”

“Excel… *yawn*…lent.”

“If I may speak Lieutenant Captain,” Nurse Redheart stated, “you’re looking rather tired.”

“I’m aware of that,” Luna agreed, knowing that ever since her abduction into Cyanocus she had been awake for at least a whole day, “I’ll get some sleep once Rainbow Dash and Rarity have embraced Blue-Berrien heritage. Any new sensor readings Miss Cheerilee?” Luna asked.

Cheerilee broke the formation and gave the communication systems one last check for any new signals.

“Negative, no new readings at the moment.” She replied.

“Keep me and my sister posted for new readings. It will only be a matter time before the Earth displays its response.” Lieutenant Captain Luna ordered, rolling off to rendezvous with her sister.

“Yes madam.” Cheerilee replied, saluting Luna alongside Nurse Redheart and Dr. Shy.

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
"Would you mind telling us where we are going." Rainbow Dash asked impatiently. "I'm starting to get bored."

"I'm actually getting tired of the suspense as well, so can we just get on with it." Rarity added

"Please calm down you two, we will be there shortly." Celestia replied as she rolled along.

Eventually the group arrived at their destination and Celestia used her visor berry to open the doors. Inside there were some massage tables, mud baths, a sauna room, a manicure/pedicure station and other items which made Rarity and Rainbow Dash realize what this room was.

"A spa." Rainbow Dash said in a little dumbfounded tone of voice." "Your big plan to turn us over to your side is a spa?"

"Even Blue-Berriens enjoy a good spa to help relax the body and mind." Celestia said. "I think that after a little rest and relaxation, you two will be more open-minded to what we have to say."

"Normally I would enjoy a free spa day as much as the next person." "But this has “its a trap written” all over it." Rarity said suspiciously.

Just then, two Blue-Berriens rolled in from the back end of the room and Rarity instantly recognized two women as the owners of the spa downtown.

"Is every female in town a alien blueberry?" Rarity thought to herself.

"Hello Aloe Vera, Lotus Blossom." Celestia said, greeting the two Blue-Berriens who were apart of the medical staff.

"Greetings Captain Celestia." The two women said simultaneously while giving a Blue-Berrien salute.

Then Aloe Vera's visor berry started to vibrate slightly so she checked the incoming data.

"Oh my." Aloe Vera said with a surprised look on her face. "Captain it looks like you are well overdue for juicing."

"She does look like she's ready to burst." Lotus Blossom added.

"I know I've been putting off my juicing for a while now.” Celestia admitted. “I just wanted to enjoy the pleasure of being full and round for as long as I could before I had to get juiced.”

Before the conversation could go any further, the group heard the sound of two more Blue-Berriens rolling towards them. The sounds came from Applejack and Fluttershy as they entered the spa room. While Fluttershy was happy to see that Rarity and Rainbow Dash were unharmed, Applejack was trying her best to avoid eye contact with the pair as she had a gut feeling that they had not forgiven her actions from earlier.

“Applejack.” Rainbow Dash and Rarity said in the same deadpan tone of voice.

“Howdy girls.” Applejack replied with a slight tone of guilt in her voice.

“You called for us Captain Celestia?” Fluttershy asked curiously.

“Yes I did.” Celestia said. “Applejack, Fluttershy and Pinkie Pie it is time for your first juicing.”

“I thought you wanted their help with something else.” Pinkie Pie said as her mood started to improve a bit.

“It can wait until later.” Celestia replied confidently. “For now you three need to get into the routine of knowing when to juice yourselves.

“It's not going to be painful is it?” Fluttershy asked nervously.

"A Blue-Berrien's first juicing is always the toughest, but it gets easier over time." Lotus Blossom explained. "You'll find the juicing station in the back, Captain."

"Thank you Lotus Blossom." Celestia said. "Follow me girls."

Then Celestia rolled towards the back of the room with Applejack, Fluttershy and Pinkie Pie following her. Which left Rarity and Rainbow Dash alone with the spa duo.

“How about we start off your spa treatment with a massage?” Aloe Vera asked. “I guarantee you'll feel you more like yourself when it's done.

“That actually sounds divine, I could really go for one right now.” Rarity said in a somewhat exhausted tone.

“I guess I could go for one as well, but no funny business got it.” Rainbow Dash stated.

“We promise.” Lotus Blossom replied.

So Rarity and Rainbow Dash went and laid down on the massage tables with Aloe Vera near Rarity's table and Lotus Blossom near Rainbow Dash's table. Once Rarity and Rainbow Dash got comfortable, the two heard a weird sound coming from up above them. Just then a pair of robotic arms appeared from the ceiling and lowered themselves about the massage tables.

“What are those?” Rainbow Dash asked nervously.

“These robotic arms are what we use to give massages to Blue-Berriens.” Aloe Vera explained. “They are controlled through the visor berry similar to an RC car.”

What the spa duo didn’t tell Rarity and Rainbow Dash was that the robotic arms are capable of mimicking the touch and sensation of anyone’s hands as long as they have the DNA of the person they wish to imitate. This unique feature of the robotic arms was Captain Celestia’s plan. With Rarity and Rainbow Dash being stubborn, both Celestia and Luna came to the conclusion that it was better to ask for forgiveness than permission. So while the two girls were still unconscious, Nurse Redheart collected a few strands of hair from Windy Whistles and Cookie Crumbles and inserted the hair into the DNA holder which was located in the elbow of the arms.

“You know for these arms being made of metal, they actually give great back massages.” Rainbow Dash said in a relaxed tone of voice.

“I agree, and the foot massages are divine.” Rarity added.

The spa duo continued to work their magic hoping that being in contact with their mother’s DNA would awaken the girl’s dormant Blue-Berrien genes.
1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.title: Rarity, Rainbow, Pinkie and Celestia

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
Rarity blushed as the alien machinery handled her body. As Rarity’s eyelids closed, her face began to develop a blue complexion, and quickly began to spread out to the rest of her body. She moaned and purred, leaving her alone in thought.

“My… This is so relaxing…” Rarity said to herself in own thoughts, “Who knew the aliens could create such pleasure. If they could build such a heavenly massage machine like this, then maybe this it would be so bad. I certainly won’t mind…”

Upon lowering her mental defenses, Rarity’s face began to turn blue and her stomach started to fill. Rainbow Dash caught sight of her friend’s skin tone shifting blue and realized it was indeed a trap.

“Rarity! snap out of it!” Rainbow Dash yelled, “This spa is trying to turn us into Blueberries!”

Rarity opened her eyes and saw that her skin was indeed turning blue and her stomach was starting to protrude at a rather quick pace.

“Uhh *nervous chuckle*… Whoops?”

Realizing it was too late to save her remaining friend, Rainbow Dash focused on getting herself out. Of course, escape would be no easy task, as the arms began to tighten their hold onto her to force alien genetic codes to awaken.

“Please just relax yourself, Miss Rainbow Dash.” Aloe ordered.

“Never!” Rainbow yelled out loud.

A struggle ensued, but thankfully, Rainbow was able to free herself from robotic hands. The door was locked from the outside, but Rainbow Dash quickly saw an air duct. She quickly got the cover off and climbed inside. The air duct wasn’t ideal, but it could work, after all Rainbow Dash had to do was get herself out at the first available exit.

1533222122321111221223212111122231111221.content:
"Okay Dash, calm down" Rainbow Dash thought to herself as she crawled through the air ducts. "You just need to find your way out of the school and get away from this whole blueberry ordeal."

Rainbow Dash pulled out her phone from her pocket and turned on the flashlight so she could see where she was going. She saw that there wasn't a lot of space to move around and saw narrow beams of light coming from smaller vents.

"Alright, time to get moving." Rainbow Dash said quietly.

Rainbow Dash proceeded to crawl through the air ducts for what seemed like hours looking for an ideal place to exit. But as she looked through each vent, all she saw were Blue-Berriens, weird machines or both. Pretty soon Rainbow Dash felt that her belly was beginning to rise up from the metal floor.

"Why do I feel weird? Rainbow Dash said with a bad feeling in her gut.

Rainbow Dash then pointed her phone towards herself to see what issue was, but couldn't due to the limited space of the air duct. She was able to see her arms and what she saw caused her heart to skip a beat. Rainbow Dash saw that the color of her arms were changing into a darker shade of blue and realized that mechanical hands from the spa awoke her Blue-Berrien DNA.

"No no no no." Rainbow Dash said panicking." I need to get out of here before it's too late."

Then Rainbow Dash tried to crawl as fast as she could but she soon realized that she wasn't moving at all. Rainbow Dash's body was already blowing up with juice which left her stuck in the air ducts.

"Okay going into the air ducts was probably not the smartest idea I ever had." Rainbow Dash admitted to herself. "But if I don't find a way out soon, I'll burst from the pressure."

Just then Rainbow Dash heard a strange noise, though it was a bit muffled as it was coming from behind her and she couldn't see anything past her ever growing body. All of a sudden, a bright light pierced through the metal (which Rainbow Dash realizes that it was a laser and it was responsible for the noise) a few feet away from her. Once the laser was done cutting through the metal, the air duct that Rainbow Dash was in fell to the floor and cracked open like an egg. Once Rainbow Dash’s eyes adjusted to the light, she saw...
