15332221223211112212232121111222313.content:
(Back on the Starship Cyanocus)

Captain Celestia, jiggling from the large intake of juice inside her round body, hit the final keys on the video transmitter. With Luna seeming to have taken her visor berry, this was the only real way to contact Madame Azuris. Taking a minute to check if she was juicy enough to be truley presentable, Celestia waited as the machinery whizzed and vibrated. Before long, a screen popped up from the machine and the stern, yet soft face of Chairwoman Azuris came into view. "Ah, Captain Celestia. I assume you have a reason for calling." "Yes madam. Forgive me for asking but my sister and I never had the chance to ask. What was it that happened to our empire to cause the mass displacement of our kind?" Azuris sighed, her blueberry earrings leaning against her violet body. "It all began when we had first sent out a squadron to find your ship. After so many years without a word, we assume something must have gone wrong. Our rescue team wasn't even halfway through our galaxy before they found a ship from Wato Mela under attack by mercinaries. Mercenaries that, we would later find out, were hired by those unworthy cretins at Tomaterria." Even after so many years, those planets' names painted very clear pictures in the space captian's head. Wato Mela was a rather primitive planet compared to the rest of the planet's in the Juicy Way but were nonetheless important in the making of most of her home world's machinery. Tomaterria.....that planet was rather despised in the Federation. After somehow getting launched from orbit in the Vegitery system, the planet latched onto the gravity well of the Juicy way, throwing the whole gravity of the planet out of wack. "Just as we were prepared to confront Tomaterria on the matter, it attacked our own planet and used what resources they stole to create some strange device that blew our whole planet out of the system. Without the warmth of our sun, the planet quickly began to freeze. We had no choice but to leave. Unfortunately, the blast knocked us so far away that we can't tell where the Juicy Way is anymore. And without that knowledge, we can't even contact our allies to bring us back. It was only through the slimmest of chances that our flagship managed to find your signal." Celestia couldn't help but tear up. Her home planet ruined, all the while she was sitting down on that rock acting like she was just a simple school berry. If it wasn't because she had lost her memory and heritage during this.....oh.... "Anywho, the first of our dropships are a little ahead of schedule actually. In a few days you will have quite a few Blueberrians on yourselves. Which reminds me, how is the whole colonization mission coming along?" Celestia decided there was no use lying given the circumstances and just needed to explain. At first, Azuris chuckled as if it was a joke. But as Celestia continued to explain the issue of DNA to her leader, the smile of the chairwoman became a mix of confusion and intrique. "Interesting....and your sister is down there preparing to convert those into thier 'true forms?'" "Yes Chairwoman Azuris. Now I know some of what I have explained to you sounds preposterous." "From a less trustworthy pilot maybe, but I believe every word out of you. I must say these magic girls sounds interesting. And if they are Blueberrian, then they might make colonization easier. Bending the wills of those earthlings better than any number of retention spirals....." "Excuse me? What was that?" "Oh don't worry your little blue head Celestia. And speaking of retention spirals....." In a flash, half of the screen was covered by a blue and purple spiral. Celestia couldn't help but look into it as Azuris smiled. "Don't worry Celestia. I'm doing this for the good our our kind, your kind....all you need to remember is our superiority....." "Superiority....yes...." Celestia mumbled as her eyes began to match the spiral.

The door to the room open and shut as Luna returned to the hallway and continued walking down it. As she took in a deep breath of the blueberry air, a smile creeped to her face. It was just so....comforting.....homely. But still....she found it hard to believe she was the alien from the entries. It just didn't seem right, along with a strange tightness coming from her pants and shirt. Looking to herself, Luna found that her clothes did indeed seem tighter and while this did alarm her, it didn't as much as it should have. Luna took another whiff of the fruity smell as she came upon two doors. Both clicked in her mind as rooms of importance, but which one to go into......

Years later, modern Maretropolis
1533322111.content:
Twilight sighed as she banged her head slightly against her desk. The work of a princess was so exhausting and tireing sometimes. Even considering most of the problems were simple, their were just too many to count easily. Being the smart little alicorn that she was though, she created a clear schedule for her to show between work and relaxing. Looking to her timer, she realized it was about time for her to relax and she knew exactly how. She teleported over to her nightstand and picked up what appeared to be comic books. The last time she was in the human world, she had managed to find these beauties that sparked an otherwise nonexistent interest in comics. The comic appeared to be a similar set up to the Power Ponies comics of Equestria, same costumes and everything. In her ever growing curiosity of human society and culture, she had bought these comics and brought them home. "Okay, where was I in my readings?" Twilight flipped the books around until she spied a cover she hadn't seen before. On it were figures similar to what her friends had worn in that enchanted comic all running towards what appeared to be a blue sphere. When Twilight looked closer however, she noticed clothes and a head on the sphere. Curiosity now peaking, Twilight opened the book.


All was quiet within the usually bustling streets of Maretropolis' night scene. Most folks had either gone off to bed or were out of town on business. On the edge of town however, lights were still beaming in the scientifc research facility 2Day. This building was the workplace of scientists who pledged to decicate their lives to the pursuit of medical and scientific research. One such scientist was standing over by her window, breathing in the crisp night air. Miss Blueberry Blossoms gave a sigh of pride as she turned back to her work bench. Multiple beakers filled with blue liquids were either bubbling over burners or frozen. Three pots with small blueberry plants stood in the center, gaining sunlight from a lamp in the middle. Berry put a finger to her chin as she picked a blueberry from each plant. Picking the most clean of the three, she put it under a microscope and focused the lens. Her free hand reached over to the nearby computer and typed in a line of code. "Umm...Miss Blossoms?" Berry swirved her head around at the sudden voice to see the head scientist poking his head in. "Ah, Mister Beaker, I was just finishing up for the night." Berry was about to give her superior a handshake but stopped when she saw his face. It seemed...distraught to put it simply. "Miss Blossom....The president of the facility told me to give you this." Berry took hold of the red envelope with a trembling hand. "Red envelope......" She said in an equally trembling voice, "......Only two reasons that would be....." Mr. Beaker turned away solemnly, knowing well what it ment, there were two reasons but both mwnt the same thing. Berry didn't even open the thing before she teared up. "I'm fired? I can't be...." "I'm really sorry Berry, he told me that he thought of your experiments as 'budget consuming' and 'worthless'." Berry dropped the envelope and turned to her desk. "I'm so close though! I just need a few more weeks to certify my serums!" Berry took hold of the closet blueberry plant. "If it would work, people wouldn't need to worry about drought or famine. Blueberries would soon become the easiest and quickest produce to ever produce!" Berry looked back at her superior, now crying into the plant's soil. "The motto of 2Day is "2Day can make a better 2Morrow. Well this would make it perfect!" Mr. Beaker put a hand on his former workmate. "You'll need to clean up before you leave. The boss doesn't want anything left in this lab. I'm sorry....truly I am." Without another word, Mr. Beaker left the room.

It was a hasty setup, being on the short notice that it was. This greenhouse had been abandoned for years though, so no one word interrupt her work. "Worthless.....well, we'll see. Berry held one of the beakers of blue and mixed it with an odd violet substance. "When I perfect this serum, that stupid dirt bag will beg me to come back." The beaker now glowed a dark blue, it was ready. Berry turned to a plant pot filled with dried up soil. "A single blueberry seed in soil from a typical drought environment. A little of my new formula should make it grow like it was hit with an instant growth formula....which is pretty much what it is." Berry carefully poured a small drop onto the dirt and watched it soak into the dirt. She set the beaker down on the table and eyed the dirt carefully. After a few seconds, she saw some of the dirt beginning to sift. A small sprout was already beginning to form. Berry squeed with delight...until the sprout quickly wilted. Normally Berry was a patient woman, but that was the finall straw. She fulng her fists about in rage shouting horrible phrases that wouldn't possibly fit in this story's' rating. Her rage quit when she hit one of the large columns holding the place up. Her surprise made her lose her valence, falling to the hard floor. As she hit the ground, she also bonked her head on the table. The serum, which had been placed on the edge, tipped over. The dark blue liquid was now spilling over into the unconscious woman's mouth.
1533322111.title: Start at the origin.

choices: Make the serum, find a way to force others
Make your berries, sell them to unsuspecting people
15333221111.content: Light filtered in through the windows of the old greenhouse, spreading throughout the building. Berry Blossoms could feel the light hitting her eyes and groaned in pain over a new headache. "Ohhh...how long was I out for. Berry opened her eyes and attempted to pull herself up. I say attempted because she realized instantly that something was wrong. She could feel like weight had somehow been blasted right into her, causing making it hard to get up. Also, while she felt her arms and legs move, they didn't seem to be moving anywhere. Berry looked to herself, curious at what was going on. Her eyes opened wide at what layed before her. Her body had now blown up into a large, round shape and her asking was a darker blue then usual. "What.....how?" Looking above her, Berry took note of the beaker that was on it side and pieced it together. "Okay....so this is what my serum can do? Make me...." She looked at herself again, "...a blueberry? What good can that do?" Taking advantage of her knowledge in sphere movement, Berry rolled her body around until she was now upright. As she did, she heard the sounds of juice sloshing around in her body. Berry signed as she looked back to the wilted plant. "So I grow into this freak and you just shrivel, wonder how got the better deal." Out of anger more then anything else, Blueberry spat at the plant. Before the liquid sunk into the dirt, Blueberry took notice of the blue color and juice-like appearance. Blueberry gave another sigh as she wondered what to do now. Before she could begin feeling sorry for herself though, the plant once again caught her eye. Just a few seconds ago, it was a shriveled thing. But now it was healthy, large , and already producing blueberries. Blueberry gasped in delight, her formula DID work....just not how she had planned. Using as much of her legs as possible, Blueberry began to waddle towards the door, needing fresh air to think this through. "So...it seems I am capable of growing quick and sustaining blueberry plants like I wanted. Now to get rid of this odd blueberry forrrr.....oh my." Blueberry's sentence had faltered as she stepped out into the sun. As the rays hit her blue body, she could feel it being turned into energy like she was some kind of living plant. It felt so calming...so peaceful.....so....heavenly. "Mmmmm." Blueberry let out as she took it all in. "Able to grow blueberries, full of juice so I can't get thirsty, able to do some odd form of photosynthesis for energy, and feeling sooooo good. Best...accident....ever." After a few minutes of 'sunbathing' Berry realized something important. "I can't keep this to myself! Everyone needs to know about this! Everyone needs to become a blueberry!" Her smile and prideful face dripped down when she realized the only way for her to get this out had been crushes last night by her company. Then there was her new form in general. How the heck would anyone not be freaked out by the large blueberry she now was? Blueberry looked to the empty beaker that once held her concoction. "Hmmm....Making the serum isn't too hard, I just need blueberries and a few herbs. Who knows? Maybe my new blueberries already have the stuff in them?" Blueberry leaned to the plant and took a fruit. She munched it down, seeing her form growing rounder and larger. Definitely had the serum in them. "So...I could mass produce my serum and find a way to get others to drink it or I could mass produce my blueberries to sell to the public. Either way might get me in trouble so I'all do it under a new name. Hmmmm....what was the last name of that girl from that story....oh yeah. I'll do my work as Blueberry Beauregard."
15333221111.title: The next day, Berry sees her new body

choices: The Power Ponies come in to stop her
The next day...
1533322112.content:
All seemed quiet in the streets of Maretropolis, an uncommon occurance. What few people were in the streets were merely heading home after a party or a hard day's work. The cold night air whirled some discarded newspapers, scaring away a stray cat. Everything was quite, peaceful, and (for once) without the sight of villainy anywhere.

At least in the city itself.

Not too far from the city limits stood the Maretropolis Water Treatment plant. As anyone on the street would tell you, this facility prided itself in making the water flowing in and out of the city as clean as possible. On the outside, it seemed that nothing was out of the ordinary. On the inside however....

Three guards layed on the floor of the security office, knocked out and tied up. There was clear signs of a struggle as the chairs were overturned and crushed. The black screens gave hint to the fact all the cameras were off. A little ways off from the office was an open door marked Hydro-cleaning facilities(which was basically a term used to make the machines that clean the water sound fancy.) "Hurry up my little seedlings." A soft female voice sounded from inside the room, "The night won't last forever." Inside, multiple figures dressed like human blueberries rushed about carrying large containers of a thick blue substance. These containers were being carried from a large sack over to the vat of water that had already been put through the filtering. These figures, Surveying the action from the catwalk above was then woman giving to the orders. You wouldn't be wrong to call her round as most of her body was that very shape. Her hair was combed to look like the top of a blueberry, further hinting her theme. "A few more gallons and the effects of our little concoction will spread into the town's entire water system. Soon all will become blueberries, all under the rule of Blueberry Beauregard!"
1533322112.title: Start at the grand plan.

choices: She reveals the plan.
She sends the henchmen to fight them.
15333221121.content:
"Okay, here we go," Masked Matterhorn whispered to the others on the roof of the lair, The girls gave each other a fist bump before crashing through the roof with a perfect landing.
"It's over now Beauregard!" Flash yelled, pointing straight at her.
"Ah these goodie goodies. What a surprise." Blue said in sarcasm. "Your timing couldn't be more perfect," She said, before letting out a bit of a sinister chuckle."
"What in tarnation are you talking about?" Mistress Marevolous asked in confusion.
15333221121.title: The Power Ponies come in to stop her

153332211211.content:
Blueberry gave out a dark chuckle as her minions surrounded the 7. "Well, you've come at a point where there is no way my plan can be stopped. So I might as well tell you the penalty of not stopping me. Already my minions have poured gallons of my new Blueberrium serum into the water supply. It's slowly snaking it's way through Maretropolis' plumbing system as we speak. When tomorrow comes, so much as a drop of it will make anyone who drinks the serum saturated water will begin growing into big, juice-filled blueberries like me! After my girls finish you off like the annoyances you are, there will be no one to stop me!"
Mistress Marevolous pulled out her lasso and yelled out, "Well they ain't gonna beat us so yet outta luck there!" The rope began to squirm around two of the henchman as Filly Second boosted right out of the circle. One of the more muscle filled berry-dressed girls began swinging at Radiance, who yawned in boredom. Her cuffs glowed as an image on a large ornate pillow appeared before her, shielding her from the attack.

Blueberry watched from her perch as her minions were trying yet failing to even land a hit on the heros. She looked to the few still pouring in the serum and yelled. "Forget the stuff! Stop those hero's before they ruin everything!"

15333222211.content:
So, you have chosen Twilight Velvet? A decision most wise you have made. Consider your next path carefully.

Path 1 - Years have passed since Velvet walked away from her role as Songstress and partner of the wonderful, whimsical Celly Wonka. But, her loving daughter Twilight has won a Golden Ticket into the illustrious factory and has asked Velvet to venture in with her.After all, it would only be right to allow Velvet a chance to catch up with an old friend. But old flames are easier to stoke than she believes, and perhaps the wily charms of Celly are enough to convince her to play with an old favorite i the back~

Path 2 - Life couldn't be sweeter for esteemed writer Twilight Velvet, as her latest entry into the long running Velveteen Mysteries pre-teen series has been doing nothing but cashing in royalty checks for many years. But when she decides to reach back into the old writing well, she finds a nw story on her heart, a story that guides failiar faces in her life into new, bold and blue directions no one could have seen. And it's funny how often life reflects fiction...

Path 3 - What was supposed to be a delightful vacation on a coastal Maine town has become yet another world-saving mission for Agent T. Velvet. Between family activities and soaking up the New England rays, Velvet has her hands full dodging lasers, gathering intel and catching a bio-terrorist ring before they can spring their latest scheme on the world. Hopefully Agent Velvet hasn't gotten too old for this kind of mission...
